sourceString: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 mostly experience great fear of the highly contagious and even fatal disease, and quarantined people also experience boredom, loneliness, and anger.
targetString: Iziguli okunezinsolo noma eziqinisekisiwe ukuthi ziphethwe i-COVID-19 ngokuvamile ziyasisaba kakhulu isifo esithelelena kakhulu futhi esibulalayo, futhi abantu abazivalele baphinde babhoreke, babe nesizungu, kanye nolaka.

sourceString: Furthermore, symptoms of the infection such as fever, hypoxia, and cough as well as adverse effects of the treatments such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to more anxiety and mental distress.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwalokho, izimpawu zokutheleleka ezifana nemfiva, i-hypoxia, nokukhwehlela kanye nemiphumela ebucayi yokwelashwa efana nokuqwasha ebangelwa ama-corticosteroid ingaholela ekubeni nexhala okwengeziwe nokucindezeleka ngokomqondo.

sourceString: In the early phase of the SARS outbreak, a range of psychiatric morbidities including persistent depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicidality were reported.
targetString: Esigabeni sokuqala sokubheduka kwe-SARS, izifo eziningi ezihlobene nengqondo okuhlanganisa ukucindezeleka okuphikelelayo, ixhala, ukushaywa uvalo, ukuphazamiseka kwekhono lengqondo lokunyakazisa umzimba, izimpawu zokusangana, ukuhanjelwa ingqondo, ngisho nokufuna ukuzibulala kwabikwa.

sourceString: Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as a part of the public health responses to the COVID-19 outbreak, can make people more anxious and guilty about the effects of the contagion, quarantine, and stigma on their families and friends.
targetString: Ukulandelelwa kokuxhumana okuyimpoqo nokuzivalela, njengengxenye yokusabela kwezempilo yomphakathi ekubhedukeni kwe-COVID-19, kungase kwenze abantu abaningi babe nexhala futhi bazizwe benecala mayelana nemiphumela yokuthelelana, ukuzivalela, kanye nesigcwagcwa emndenini nakubangane babo.

sourceString: Thus, mental health care should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected individuals, and people in contact with them as well as the general public who are in need.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, ukunakekelwa kwempilo yengqondo kufanele kunikezwe iziguli ze-COVID-19, abantu okusolwa ukuthi banayo, nabantu abaxhumana nabo kanye nomphakathi ovamile oludingayo.

sourceString: The psychological support should include the establishment of multidisciplinary mental health teams, clear communications with regular and accurate updates about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other.
targetString: Usizo lwezengqondo kufanele luhlanganise ukusungulwa kwamathimba ezempilo yengqondo yemikhakha eminingi, ukuxhumana okucacile okunezibuyekezo zezikhathi zonke nezinembile ezimayelana nokubheduka kwe-SARS-CoV-2 kanye nezinhlelo zokwelashwa kanye nokusetshenziswa kwamadivayisi ezokwelashwa kagesi kanye nezinhlelo zokugwema ukusondelana ngokuseduze nabanye.

sourceString: Effective vaccines are essential for interrupting the chain of transmission from animal reservoirs and infected humans to susceptible hosts and are often complementary to antiviral treatment in the control of epidemics caused by emerging viruses.
targetString: Imigomo esebenzayo ibalulekile ukuze kugqashulwe iketanga lokuthelelana ukusuka ezilwaneni nabantu abathelelekile kuye kubabungazi abangase bachayeke futhi ngokuvamile iyahambelana nokwelashwa okulwa namagciwane ekulawulweni kwemiqedazwe ebangelwa amagciwane amasha.

sourceString: Efforts have been made to develop S protein-based vaccines to generate long-term and potent neutralizing antibodies and/or protective immunity against SARS-CoV.
targetString: Kwenziwe imizamo yokwenza imigomo esekelwe kuphrotheni ka-S ukuze kwenziwe izivikeli-mzimba zesikhathi eside nezinamandla okubulala kanye/noma ukuvikeleka kokungayitholi i-SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Live-attenuated vaccines have been evaluated in animal models for SARS.
targetString: Imigomo ebukhoma encishiwe amandla iye yahlolwa ezilwaneni ngokuqondene ne-SARS.

sourceString: However, the in vivo efficacy of these vaccine candidates in elderly individuals and lethal-challenge models and their protection against zoonotic virus infection have yet to be determined before a clinical study is initiated.
targetString: Nokho, ukusebenza ezintweni eziphilayo kwalawa makhandidethi omgomo kubantu abadala kanye namamodeli enselele ebulalayo kanye nokuvikeleka kwawo ekungenweni igciwane elisuka ezilwaneni liye kubantu kusazotholwa ngaphambi kokuthi kuqaliswe ucwaningo lwezokwelashwa.

sourceString: This is probably because SARS died down 17 years ago and no new case has been reported since.
targetString: Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi i-SARS yathula eminyakeni engu-17 edlule futhi akukho ukugula kwayo okusha okuye kwabikwa kusukela ngaleso sikhathi.

sourceString: In contrast, sporadic cases and clusters of MERS continue to occur in the Middle East and spread to other regions owing to the persistence of zoonotic sources in endemic areas.
targetString: Ngakolunye uhlangothi, izimo eziyimvela kancane kanye namaqoqo e-MERS ayaqhubeka evela e-Middle East futhi asakazeka nakwezinye izifunda ngenxa yokuphikelela kwemithombo yamagciwane asuka ezilwaneni aye kubantu ezindaweni ezinesifo.

sourceString: Vaccination strategies have been developed for MERS by using inactivated virus, DNA plasmids, viral vectors, nanoparticles, virus-like particles and recombinant protein subunits and some have been evaluated in animal models.
targetString: Amasu okugoma aye enzelwa i-MERS ngokuthi kusetshenziswe igciwane elingasebenzi, ama-plasmid e-DNA, ama-vector egciwane, ama-nanoparticle, izinhlayiya ezifana negciwane kanye namayunithi angaphansi ephrotheni eyinhlanganisela futhi amanye aye ahlolwa kumamodeli ezilwane.

sourceString: The development of a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 for non-immune individuals is an urgent and critical task for controlling the ongoing epidemic.
targetString: Ukwakhiwa komgomo ophephile nosebenzayo omelene ne-SARS-CoV-2 kubantu abathelelekayo kuwumsebenzi ophuthumayo nobalulekile ekulawuleni umqedazwe oqhubekayo.

sourceString: However, it is challenging to overcome the difficulty because of the long period of time (averaged 18 months) needed for vaccine development and the dynamic variations of CoVs.
targetString: Nokho, kuyinselele ukumelana nobunzima ngenxa yenkathi ende (isilinganiso sezinyanga ezingu-18) edingekayo ukuze kwakhiwe umgomo kanye nezinhlobo ezishintshayo zama-CoV.

sourceString: As a novel disease, COVID-19 has just started to manifest its full clinical course throughout thousands of patients.
targetString: Njengesifo esisha, i-COVID-19 isanda kuqala ukubonisa uhlelo lwayo lwezokwelashwa olugcwele ezigulini eziyizinkulungwane.

sourceString: In most cases, patients can recover gradually without sequelae.
targetString: Ezimweni eziningi, iziguli zingakwazi ukululama kancane ngaphandle kwemiphumela yesifo sangaphambilini.

sourceString: However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 is also associated with high morbidity and mortality in patients with severe cases.
targetString: Nokho, ngokufana ne-SARS ne-MERS, i-COVID-19 iphinde ihlotshaniswe nezinga eliphakeme lokugula nokufa ezigulini ezinokugula okubucayi.

sourceString: Therefore, building a prognosis model for the disease is essential for health-care agencies to prioritize their services, especially in resource-constrained areas.
targetString: Ngakho-ke, ukwakha imodeli yembangela yesifo kubalulekile kuma-ejensi okunakekelwa kwezempilo ukuze kubekwe ekuqaleni amasevisi awo, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni ezinezinsiza ezincane.

sourceString: Based on clinical studies reported thus far, the following factors may affect or be associated with the prognosis of COVID-19 patients (Table ​(Table33):
targetString: Ngokusekelwe kuzingcwaningo zokwelashwa ezibikwe kuze kube manje, izici ezilandelayo zingase zithinte noma zihlotshaniswe nembangela yeziguli ze-COVID-19 (Ithebula ​(Ithebula33):

sourceString: Age: Age was the most important factor for the prognosis of SARS, which is also true for COVID-19.
targetString: Ubudala: Ubudala babuyisici esibaluleke kakhulu sembangela ye-SARS, okuyiqiniso futhi nge-COVID-19.

sourceString: COVID-19 mainly happened at the age of 30-65 with 47.7% of those patients being over 50 in a study of 8,866 cases as described above.
targetString: I-COVID-19 yavela ngokuyinhloko kubudala obungu-30-65 futhi u-47.7% walezo ziguli zazingaphezu kuka-50 kucwaningo lweziguli ezingu-8,866 njengoba kuchazwe ngenhla.

sourceString: Patients who required intensive care were more likely to have underlying comorbidities and complications and were significantly older than those who did not (at the median age of 66 versus 51), suggesting age as a prognostic factor for the outcome of COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Iziguli ezazidinga ukunakekelwa kwezimo ezibucayi zazinethuba eliphakeme lokuphathwa ezinye izifo nezinkimbinkimbi futhi zazindala ngokuphawulekayo kunalezo ezingenazo (ubudala ongu-66 buqhathaniswa no-51), okusikisela ukuthi ubudala buyisici esiyimbangela kumphumela kuziguli eziphethwe i-COVID-19.

sourceString: Sex: SARS-CoV-2 has infected more men than women (0.31/100,000 versus 0.27/100,000), as described above.
targetString: Ubulili: I-SARS-CoV-2 igulise abantu besilisa abaningi kunabantu besifazane (u-0.31/100,000 oqhathaniswa no-0.27/100,000), njengoba kuchazwe ngenhla.

sourceString: Comorbidities and complications: Patients with COVID-19 who require intensive care are more likely to suffer from acute cardiac injury and arrhythmia.
targetString: Izifo ezikhona kakade nezinkimbinkimbi: Iziguli eziphethwe i-COVID-19 ezidinga ukunakekelwa okubucayi zinethuba eliphakeme lokuphathwa ukulimala kwenhliziyo okubucayi kanye ne-arrhythmia.

sourceString: Cardiac events were also the main reason for death in SARS patients.
targetString: Izehlakalo ezihlobene nenhliziyo zaphinde zaba isizathu esiyinhloko sokufa kweziguli ezine-SARS.

sourceString: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 can also bind to ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, which might lead to liver dysfunctions in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Kuphindwe kwabikwa ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 iyakwazi futhi ukunamathela kuma-ACE2-positive cholangiocyte, okungase kuholele ekungasebenzini kahle kwesibindi kuziguli eziphethwe i-COVID-19.

sourceString: It is worth noting that age and underlying disease are strongly correlated and might interfere with each other.
targetString: Kuhle ukuphawula ukuthi ubudala kanye nesifo esikhona kakade kuhlobene nokuqinile futhi kungase kuphazamisane.

sourceString: Abnormal laboratory findings: The C-reactive protein (CRP) level in blood reflects the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and has been proposed to be a potential prognostic factor for disease, response to therapy, and ultimate recovery.
targetString: Imiphumela yaselabhorethri engavamile: Izinga lephrotheni ye-C-reactive (CRP) egazini ibonisa ubucayi bokuvuvukala noma ukulimala kwesicubu futhi kuye kwaphakanyiswa ukuthi kuyisici esingase sibe imbangela yesifo, ukusabela ekwelashweni, kanye nokululama okuphelele.

sourceString: The correlation of CRP level to the severity and prognosis of COVID-19 has also been proposed.
targetString: Kuphinde kwenziwa ukuhlobana kwezinga le-CRP nobucayi nembangela ye-COVID-19.

sourceString: In addition, elevated lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and creatine kinase (CK) may also help predict the outcome.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwalokho, i-lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) ephakeme, i-aspartate aminotransferase (AST), i-alanine aminotransferase (ALT), kanye ne-creatine kinase (CK) ingase futhi isize ukubikezela umphumela.

sourceString: These enzymes are expressed extensively in multiple organs, especially in the heart and liver, and are released during tissue damage.
targetString: Lawa ma-enzyme aboniswa kabanzi ezithweni eziningi, ikakhulukazi enhliziyweni nakusibindi, futhi kukhululwa phakathi nokulimala kwesicubu.

sourceString: Thus, they are traditional markers for heart or liver dysfunctions.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, ziyizinkomba ezivamile zokungasebenzi kahle kwenhliziyo noma isibindi.

sourceString: Major clinical symptoms: Chest radiography and temporal progression of clinical symptoms should be considered together with the other issues for the prediction of outcomes and complications of COVID-19.
targetString: Izimpawu zokwelashwa ezinkulu: I-radiography yesifuba nokuqhubeka kwesikhashana kwezimpawu zokwelashwa kufanele zicatshangelwe ndawonye nezinye izinkinga zokubikezelwa kwemiphumela nezinkimbinkimbi ze-COVID-19.

sourceString: Use of steroids: As described above, steroids are immunosuppressant commonly used as an adjunctive therapy for infectious diseases to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: Ukusetshenziswa kwama-steroid: Njengoba kuchazwe ngenhla, ama-steroid angama-immunosuppressant ngokuvamile asetshenziswa njengokwelashwa kokwenezela kwezifo ezithelelanayo ukuze kuncishiswe ubucayi komonakalo wokuvuvukala.

sourceString: Since a high dosage of corticosteroids was widely used in severe SARS patients, many survivors suffered from avascular osteonecrosis with life-long disability and poor life quality.
targetString: Njengoba kusetshenziswe kabanzi inani eliphakeme lama-corticosteroid kuziguli ezine-SARS ebucayi, iningi labantu abasinda babephethwe i-avascular osteonecrosis benokukhubazeka kokuphila kwabo konke nezinga lokuphila elingelihle.

sourceString: Thus, if needed, steroids should be used at low dosage and for a short time in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, uma edingekile, ama-steroid kufanele asetshenziswe ngesilinganiso esiphansi futhi isikhathi esifushane kuziguli ze-COVID-19.

sourceString: Mental stress: As described above, during the COVID-19 outbreak many patients have suffered from extraordinary stress as they often endured long periods of quarantine and extreme uncertainty and witnessed the death of close family members and fellow patients.
targetString: Ukucindezeleka komqondo: Njengoba kuchazwe ngenhla, phakathi nokubheduka kwe-COVID-19 iziguli eziningi zaphathwa ukucindezeleka okukhulu njengoba kwakufanele zibekezelele izinkathi ezide zokuzivalela nokungaqiniseki okukhulu futhi zibona ukufa kwamalungu omndeni aseduze kanye neziguli ezikanye nazo.

sourceString: It is imperative to provide psychological counseling and long-term support to help these patients recover from the stress and return to normal life.
targetString: Kusemqoka ukuthi kunikezwe ukwelulekwa komqondo nokusekelwa kwesikhathi eside ukuze kusizwe lezi ziguli zilulame ekucindezelekeni futhi zibuyele empilweni evamile.

sourceString: According to demographic studies so far, COVID-19 seems to have different epidemiological features from SARS.
targetString: Ngokuvumelana nezingcwaningo zolwazi lwabantu kuze kube manje, i-COVID-19 ibonakala inezici ze-epidemiological ezihlukile ku-SARS.

sourceString: In addition to replicating in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can efficiently replicate in the upper respiratory tract and causes mild or no symptoms in the early phase of infection, similar to other CoVs that cause common colds.
targetString: Ngaphezu kokuphindeka kumgudu wokuphefumula ongezansi, i-SARS-CoV-2 iyakwazi ukuphindeka kalula kumgudu wokuphefumula ongenhla futhi ibangele izimpawu ezincane noma ingazibangeli esigabeni sokuqala sokutheleleka, ngendlela efanayo nama-CoV abangela imikhuhlane evamile.

sourceString: Therefore, infected patients at the early phase or incubation period can produce a large amount of virus during daily activities, causing great difficulty for the control of the epidemic.
targetString: Ngakho-ke, iziguli ezithelelekile esigabeni sokuqala noma enkathini yokufukanyelwa zingakhiqiza inani elikhulu legciwane phakathi nemisebenzi yansuku zonke, okubangela ubunzima obukhulu bokulawulwa komqedazwe.

sourceString: However, the transmission of SARS-CoV was considered to occur when the patients are severely ill, while most transmission did not happen at the early phase.
targetString: Nokho, ukutheleleka kwe-SARS-CoV kwakucatshangwa ukuthi kwenzeka lapho iziguli zazigula kakhulu, kuyilapho ukutheleleka okuningi kungazange kwenzeke esigabeni sokuqala.

sourceString: Thus, the current outbreak of COVID-19 is much more severe and difficult to control than the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, ukubheduka kwe-COVID-19 kubucayi kakhulu futhi kunzima ukukulawula kunokubheduka kwe-SARS.

sourceString: Great efforts are currently underway in China including the lockdown of Wuhan and surrounding cities and continuous quarantine of almost the entire population in hopes of interrupting the transmission of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Kunemizamo eminingi eqhubekayo njengamanje e-China okuhlanganisa ukuvalwa thaqa kwe-Wuhan namadolobha azungezile nokuzivalela okuqhubekayo kwaso sonke isibalo sabantu ngethemba lokuphazamisa ukudluliswa kwe-SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Although these actions have been dramatically damaging the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new patients is declining, indicating the slowdown of the epidemic.
targetString: Nakuba lezi zinyathelo ziwulimaze kakhulu umnotho neminye imikhakha yezwe, inani leziguli ezintsha liyancipha, okubonisa ukuncipha kwejubane lomqedazwe.

sourceString: The most optimistic estimate is that the outbreak will end by March and the downswing phase will last for 3-4 months.
targetString: Isilinganiso esithembisa kakhulu esokuthi ukubheduka kuzophela ngo-March futhi isigaba sokuncipha sizoqhubeka izinyanga ezingu-3-4.

sourceString: However, some other experts are not that optimistic.
targetString: Nokho, ezinye izazi azinalo lelo themba.

sourceString: Paul Hunter, et al., estimated that COVID-19, which seems substantially more infectious than SARS, will not end in 2020.
targetString: U-Paul Hunter, et al., ulinganisa ukuthi i-COVID-19, ebonakala ithelelana kakhulu kune-SARS, ngeke iphele ngo-2020.

sourceString: Ira Longini, et al., established a model to predict the outcome of the epidemic and suggested that SARS-CoV-2 could infect two-thirds of the global population.
targetString: U-Ira Longini, et al., wasungula imodeli yokubikezela umphumela womqedazwe futhi wasikisela ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 ingase iphathe izingxenye ezimbili kwezintathu zesibalo sabantu emhlabeni wonke.

sourceString: A Canadian group reported that SARS-CoV-2 was detected in both mid-turbinate and throat swabs of patients who recovered and left the hospital 2 weeks earlier, which indicates that the newly identified virus could become a cyclical episode similar to influenza.
targetString: Iqembu lase-Canada labika ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 yatholwa kuwo womabili amaswabhu e-mid-turbinate kanye nawomphimbo eziguli ezalulama futhi zaphuma esibhedlela emavikini amabili ngaphambilini, okubonisa ukuthi igciwane elisanda kutholwa kungenzeka ukuthi libe isiqephu esiphindayo esifana nemfuluwenza.

sourceString: However, promising signs have occurred in China based on the declining number of new cases, indicating the current strategies might have been working.
targetString: Nokho, izimpawu ezithembisayo zivele e-China ngokusekelwe enanini elehlayo labantu abasha abagulayo, okubonisa ukuthi amasu amanje kungenzeka ukuthi ayasebenza.

sourceString: Ebola was originally predicted to cause up to a million cases with half a million deaths.
targetString: Ekuqaleni kwakubikezelwe ukuthi i-Ebola yayizophatha abantu abayisigidi futhi kufe ingxenye yesigidi sabantu.

sourceString: However, via strict quarantine and isolation, the disease has eventually been put under control.
targetString: Nokho, ngenxa yokuzivalela nokuzihlukanisa okuqinile, isifo sigcine silawuliwe.

sourceString: It is possible, similar to SARS-CoV, that SARS-CoV-2 might become weaker in infectivity and eventually die down or become a less pathogenic virus co-existent with humans.
targetString: Kungenzeka, njenge-SARS-CoV, ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 ingase ibe buthaka ingabi namandla futhi ekugcineni iphele noma ibe igciwane elingagulisi kakhulu elikwazi ukuphilisana nabantu.

sourceString: A comparison of the epidemic of COVID-19 with that of SARS and MERS is provided below (Fig. ​(Fig.55).
targetString: Ukuqhathaniswa komqedazwe we-COVID-19 nalowo we-SARS kanye ne-MERS kunikezwa ngezansi (Umfa. ​(Umfa.55).

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is highly transmittable through coughing or sneezing, and possibly also through direct contact with materials contaminated by the virus.
targetString: I-SARS-CoV-2 ithelelana kakhulu ngokukhwehlela noma ukuthimula, futhi kungenzeka ukuthi ngokuthintana okuqondile nezinto ezinegciwane.

sourceString: The virus was also found in feces, which raises a new possibility of feces-to-mouth transmission.
targetString: Igciwane laphinde futhi latholwa endleni, okuveza ithuba elisha lokudluliselwa okusuka endleni kuye emlonyeni.

sourceString: A recent study on 138 cases reported that 41% of the cases were possibly caused by nosocomial infections, including 17 patients with other prior diseases and 40 health-care providers.
targetString: Ucwaningo lwakamuva lweziguli ezingu-138 lwabika ukuthi u-41% weziguli kungenzeka ukuthi zatheleleka ezibhedlela, okuhlanganisa iziguli ezingu-17 ezazivele ziphethwe ezinye izifo ngaphambilini kanye nabanakekeli bezempilo abangu-40.

sourceString: Thus, great precaution should be used to protect humans, especially health-care providers, social workers, family members, colleagues, and even bystanders in contact with patients or infected people.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, kufanele kusetshenziswe ukuqapha okukhulu ukuze kuvikelwe abantu, ikakhulukazi abahlinzeki bokunakekelwa kwezempilo, osonhlalakahle, amalungu omndeni, ozakwabo, ngisho nabantu abame eduze kweziguli noma abantu abathelelekile.

sourceString: The first line of defense that could be used to lower the risk of infection is through wearing face masks; both the use of surgical masks and N95 respirator masks (series # 1860s) helps control the spread of viruses.
targetString: Umugqa wokuqala wokuvikeleka ongase usetshenziswe ukuze kwehliswe ubungozi bokutheleleka uwukugqoka amamaski obuso; kokubili ukusetshenziswa kwemaski yokuhlinzwa kanye namamaski e-N95 respirator (uchungechunge # 1860s) kusiza ukulawula ukubhebhetheka kwamagciwane.

sourceString: Surgical face masks prevent liquid droplets from a potentially infected individual from traveling through the air or sticking onto surfaces of materials, where they could be passed on to others.
targetString: Amamaski obuso okuhlinza avimba amaconsana awuketshezi avela kumuntu okungenzeka ukuthi uthelelekile ukuthi angahambi ngomoya futhi anamathele ebusweni bezinto, lapho engadluliselwa khona kwabanye abantu.

sourceString: However, only N95 (series # 1860s) masks can protect against the inhalation of virions as small as 10 to 80 nm, with only 5% of the virions being able to penetrate completely; SARS-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV in size and both are approximately 85 nm.
targetString: Nokho, amamaski e-N95 (uchungechunge # 1860s) kuphela angakwazi ukukuvikela ekuhogeleni ama-virion amancane ngo-10 kuye ku-80 nm, kuyilapho u-5% kuphela wama-virion okwazi ukudlula ngokuphelele; i-SARS-CoV-2 inosayizi ofanayo nowe-SARS-CoV kokubili kucishe kube ngu-85 nm.

sourceString: Since particles can penetrate even five surgical masks stacked together, health-care providers in direct contact with patients must wear N95 (series # 1860s) masks but not surgical masks.
targetString: Njengoba izinhlayiya zikwazi ukudlula kumamaski okuhlinza amahlanu ahlanganisiwe, abahlinzeki bezempilo abasebenza ngokuqondile neziguli kumelwe bagqoke amamaski e-N95 (uchungechunge # 1860s) hhayi amamaski okuhlinza.

sourceString: In addition to masks, health-care providers should wear fitted isolation gowns in order to further reduce contact with viruses.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwamamaski, abahlinzeki bokunakekelwa kwezempilo kufanele bagqoke amagawuni okuzivikela abalingana kahle ukuze kuncishiswe ngokwengeziwe ukuthintana namagciwane.

sourceString: Viruses can also infect an individual through the eyes.
targetString: Amagciwane angakwazi ukungena kumuntu ngamehlo.

sourceString: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 although he wore an N95 mask; the virus might have entered his body through his inflammatory eyes.
targetString: Ngo-January 22, 2020, udokotela watheleleka nge-SARS-CoV-2 nakuba ayegqoke imaski ye-N95; igciwane kungenzeka ukuthi langena emzimbeni wakhe ngokuthi lingene emehlweni akhe avuvukele.

sourceString: Thus, health-care providers should also wear transparent face shields or goggles while working with patients.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, abahlinzeki bokunakekelwa kwezempilo kufanele futhi bagqoke izivikeli zobuso ezingakwazi ukukubonisa noma izibuko ngenkathi besebenza ngeziguli.

sourceString: For the general public in affected or potentially affected areas, it is highly suggested that everybody wash their hands with disinfectant soaps more often than usual, try to stay indoors for self-quarantine and limit contact with potentially infected individuals.
targetString: Kumphakathi ovamile ezindaweni ezithintekile noma okungenzeka ukuthi zithintekile, kutuswa kakhulu ukuthi wonke umuntu ageze izandla zakhe ngensipho ekhucululayo izikhathi eziningi kunokuvamile, azame ukuhlala endlini ukuze azivalele futhi akhawule ukuxhumana nabantu okungenzeka ukuthi bathelelekile.

sourceString: Three feet is considered an appropriate distance for people to stay away from a patient.
targetString: Ibanga elingamagxathu amathathu libhekwa njengebanga elifanele lokuthi abantu baqele kude neziguli.

sourceString: These actions are effective methods to lower the risk of infection as well as prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: Lezi zinyathelo ziyizindlela ezisebenzayo zokunciphisa ingozi yokungenwa isifo kanye nokuvimba ukusakazeka kwegciwane.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV-2 came as a new virus to the human world, its high homology to SARS-CoV as reported on 7 January 2020 should have caused high alert to China based on her deep memory of the SARS outbreak in 2003.
targetString: Nakuba i-SARS-CoV-2 yafika njengegciwane elisha emhlabeni wabantu, ukuba kwayo nesakhiwo esifanayo ne-SARS-CoV njengoba kwabikwa ngo-7 January 2020 kwakufanele kube isixwayiso e-China ngenxa yokuthi yayisakukhumbula ukubheduka kwe-SARS ngo-2003.

sourceString: However, not until 19 January 2020 did the director of the Center of Disease Control of Wuhan comfort the citizens by saying that the novel virus has low contagiousness and limited reproductivity from human to human and that it is not a problem to prevent and contain the disease.
targetString: Nokho, kwaze kwaba u-19 January 2020 umqondisi we-Center of Disease Control e-Wuhan eqinisekisa izakhamuzi ukuthi igciwane elisha linokuthathelana okuncane futhi linokukhiqizeka kabusha okuncane lapho lisuka komunye umuntu liye komunye nokuthi akuyona inkinga ukuvimba nokulawula isifo.

sourceString: This message remarkably relaxed the alarm of the public, especially when the entire country was preparing for the Spring Festival, and the critical time was missed to contain the disease at its minimal scale in Wuhan.
targetString: Lo myalezo wenza umphakathi ukuthi ungaxwayi, ikakhulukazi lapho lonke izwe lalilungiselela i-Spring Festival, futhi baphuthelwa isikhathi esibucayi sokulawula igciwane ngenkathi lingakabhebhetheki lisase-Wuhan.

sourceString: The disease control agencies in China may take this hard lesson and make critical improvements in the future.
targetString: Ama-ejensi okulawula isifo ase-China angase afunde kulesi sifundo esibucayi futhi enze intuthuko ebalulekile esikhathini esizayo.

sourceString: For example, these agencies should be (1) more careful when making public announcements as every word counts to citizens and can change their attitude and decisions; (2) more sensitive and reactive to unusual information from clinics rather than waiting for formal reports from doctors or officials; (3) more restrictive to contain a potential epidemic at its early stage rather than attempting to comfort the public; and (4) more often to issue targeted and effective drills to increase the public's awareness about epidemic diseases and to test and improve the response system of the society periodically.
targetString: Ngokwesibonelo, lawa ma-ejensi kufanele (1) acophelele kakhudlwana lapho enza izimemezelo zomphakathi njengoba igama ngalinye libalulekile kuzakhamuzi futhi lingashintsha izimo zawo zengqondo kanye nezinqumo; (2) azwele futhi asabele kakhudlwana kulwazi olungajwayelekile oluvela emtholampilo kunokuba alinde imibiko egunyaziwe evela kodokotela noma izikhulu; (3) avimbe kakhudlwana ukuze alawule okungase kube umqedazwe ngenkathi kusasesigabeni sako sokuqala kunokuba bazame ukududuza umphakathi; futhi (4) enze kaningi amadrili aqondiswayo nasebenzayo ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukuqapha komphakathi mayelana nezifo ezingumqedazwe futhi kuhlolwe futhi kuthuthukiswe isistimu yokusabela komphakathi nezikhathi ezithile.

sourceString: The outbreak of COVID-19 caused by the novel virus SARS-CoV-2 started in the end of December 2019.
targetString: Ukubheduka kwe-COVID-19 okubangelwe igciwane elisha le-SARS-CoV-2 ekupheleni kuka-December 2019.

sourceString: In less than two months, it has spread all over China and near 50 other countries globally at the time of this writing.
targetString: Ezinyangeni ezingaphansi kwezimbili, selisakazekele kulo lonke elase-China kanye nakwamanye amazwe acishe abe ngu-50 emhlabeni wonke ngesikhathi kubhalwa lokhu.

sourceString: Since the virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and the symptoms are also similar between COVID-19 and SARS, the outbreak of COVID-19 has created a sense of SARS recurring.
targetString: Njengoba igciwane lifana kakhulu ne-SARS-CoV futhi nezimpawu ziyafana futhi phakathi kwe-COVID-19 ne-SARS, ukubheduka kwe-COVID-19 kudale umuzwa wokuthi i-SARS iyaphinda.

sourceString: However, there are some remarkable differences between COVID-19 and SARS, which are essential for containing the epidemic and treating the patients.
targetString: Nokho, kukhona ukuhluka okuphawulekayo phakathi kwe-COVID-19 ne-SARS, okubalulekile ukuze kulawulwe umqedazwe kanye nokwelashwa kweziguli.

sourceString: COVID-19 affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women, and the severity and death rate are also higher in elderly individual than in youth.
targetString: I-COVID-19 ithinta abantu adala abaningi kunetsha kanye nabantu besilisa abaningi kunabantu besifazane, futhi ubucayi nezinga lokufa liphinde libe phezulu kubantu abadala kunasentsheni.

sourceString: SARS has higher mortality than COVID-19 (10.91% versus 1.44%).
targetString: I-SARS inezinga lokufa eliphakeme kune-COVID-19 (u-10.91% uqhathaniswa no-1.44%).

sourceString: COVID-19 patients transmit the virus even when they are symptomless whereas SARS patients do so usually when they are severely ill, which causes much greater difficulty to contain the spread of COVID-19 than SARS.
targetString: Iziguli ze-COVID-19 zidlulisa igciwane ngisho nalapho zingenazo izimpawu kuyilapho iziguli eziphethwe i-SARS zilidlulisela uma sezigula kakhulu, okubangela inkinga enkulu nakakhulu yokulawula ukubhebhetheka kwe-COVID-19 kune-SARS.

sourceString: This partially explains why SARS-CoV-2 spread much faster and broader than SARS-CoV.
targetString: Lokhu kuchaza ngokwengxenye isizathu esenza ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 ibhebhetheke ngokushesha kakhulu nakabanzi kune-SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The regular RNA assay for SARS-CoV-2 can be negative in some COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Ukuhlaziywa okuvamile kwe-RNA ye-SARS-CoV-2 kungase kube negethivu kwezinye iziguli ze-COVID-19.

sourceString: On the other hand, cured patients can be positive for the virus again.
targetString: Ngakolunye uhlangothi, iziguli ezilashiwe zingase ziphinde zibe phozithivu lapho kuhlolwa igciwane.

sourceString: These findings dramatically increase the risk of virus spreading.
targetString: Lokhu okutholiwe kunyusa kakhulu ubungozi bokubhebhetheka kwegciwane.

sourceString: Given such rapid progress in research on COVID-19, several critical issues remain to be solved, as follows:
targetString: Njengoba kunenqubekela-phambili esheshayo kucwaningo lwe-COVID-19, kusele izinkinga ezimbalwa ezibucayi okudingeka ukuthi zixazululwe, ezihlanganisa ukuthi:

sourceString: Where did SARS-CoV-2 come from?
targetString: Iqhamuka kuphi i-SARS-CoV-2?

sourceString: Although 96% genetic homolog was found between SARS-CoV-2 and two bat SARS-like CoVs, we still cannot conclude that SARS-CoV-2 is from bats.
targetString: Nakuba kwathola ukuthi kunokufana okungu-96% kwesakhiwo sezakhi zofuzo phakathi kwe-SARS-CoV-2 kanye nama-CoV amabili amalulwane afana ne-SARS, asikwazi ukuphetha ngokuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 iqhamuka emalulwaneni.

sourceString: What animal was the intermediate species to transmit the virus from the original host, say bats, to humans?
targetString: Yisiphi isilwane esasimaphakathi nendawo esadlulisela igciwane ukusuka kumbungazi wokuqala, ake sithi amalulwane, ukuya kubantu?

sourceString: Without knowing answers to #1 and 2, we cannot efficiently cut the transmission, and the outbreak can relapse at any time.
targetString: Uma singazazi izimpendulo zika-#1 no-2, asikwazi ukunqamula ngempumelelo ukudluliswa, futhi ukubheduka kungaba kubi nakakhulu nganoma yisiphi isikhathi.

sourceString: Although molecular modeling and biochemical assays have demonstrated that SARS-CoV-2 binds to ACE2, how exactly does the virus enter the airway cells and cause subsequent pathological changes?
targetString: Nakuba amamodeli amangqamuzana kanye nokuhlaziywa kwe-biochemical kubonise ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 inamathela ku-ACE2, igciwane lingena kanjani ngempela kumaseli omgudu wokuphefumula futhi libangele izinguquko ezibangela ukugula okuwumphumela?

sourceString: Does the virus also bind ACE2-expressing cells in other organs?
targetString: Ingabe igciwane liphinde linamathele kumaseli abonisa i-ACE2 kwezinye izitho zomzimba?

sourceString: Without clear answers to these questions, we cannot achieve fast and accurate diagnosis and effective treatment.
targetString: Ngaphandle kwezimpendulo ezicacile zale mibuzo, asikwazi ukufinyelela ukuxilongwa okusheshayo nokunembile kanye nokwelashwa okusebenzayo.

sourceString: How long will the epidemic last?
targetString: Umqedazwe uzoqhubeka isikhathi eside kangakanani?

sourceString: How is the virus genetically evolving during transmission among humans?
targetString: Izakhi zofuzo zegciwane zishintsha kanjani phakathi nokuthelelana phakathi kwabantu?

sourceString: Will it become a pandemic worldwide, die down like SARS or relapse periodically like the flu?
targetString: Ingabe lizoba ubhubhane lomhlaba wonke, ingabe lizophela njenge-SARS noma lizoba libi nakakhulu ngezikhathi ezithile njengomkhuhlane?

sourceString: It is essential but may take some time to search for answers to the above and many other questions.
targetString: Kubalulekile kodwa kungase kuthathe isikhathi esithile ukucinga izimpendulo zemibuzo engenhla kanye neminye imibuzo eminingi.

sourceString: However, with whatever expense it may demand, we have no other choice but to stop the epidemic as soon as possible and bring our life back to normal.
targetString: Nokho, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi kuzodingeka izindleko ezingakanani, asinakho okunye ukukhetha ngaphandle kokuvimba umqedazwe ngokushesha ngokunokwenzeka futhi sibuyisele izimpilo zethu esimweni esivamile.

sourceString: Zoonotic origins of human coronaviruses
targetString: Imisuka yegciwane elisuka ezilwaneni liye kubantu yama-coronavirus abantu

sourceString: Mutation and adaptation have driven the co-evolution of coronaviruses (CoVs) and their hosts, including human beings, for thousands of years.
targetString: Ushintsho nokuvumelana nesimo kukhuthaze i-co-evolution yama-coronavirus (ama-CoV) kanye nombungazi wawo, okuhlanganisa abantu, izinkulungwane zeminyaka.

sourceString: Before 2003, two human CoVs (HCoVs) were known to cause mild illness, such as common cold.
targetString: Ngaphambi kuka-2003, kwakwaziwa ama-CoV abantu (ama-HCoV) amabili ayebangela ukugula okuncane, njengomkhuhlane ovamile.

sourceString: The outbreaks of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) and the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) have flipped the coin to reveal how devastating and life-threatening an HCoV infection could be.
targetString: Ukubheduka kwe-severe acute respiratory syndrome (I-SARS) kanye ne-Middle East respiratory syndrome (I-MERS) kushintshe isimo ukuze kubonise ukuthi isifo se-HCoV singabangela umonakalo omkhulu futhi sisongele ukuphila kakhulu kangakanani.

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 in central China at the end of 2019 has thrusted CoVs into the spotlight again and surprised us with its high transmissibility but reduced pathogenicity compared to its sister SARS-CoV.
targetString: Ukuvela kwe-SARS-CoV-2 e-China emaphakathi ekupheleni kuka-2019 kuphinde kwabeka ama-CoV eshashalazini futhi yasimangaza ngokutheleleka okuphakeme kodwa nge-pathogenicity encishisiwe uma iqhathaniswa nodadewabo i-SARS-CoV.

sourceString: HCoV infection is a zoonosis and understanding the zoonotic origins of HCoVs would serve us well.
targetString: Isifo se-HCoV siyi-zoonosis futhi ukuqonda imisuka ye-zoonotic yama-HCoV kungasisiza.

sourceString: Most HCoVs originated from bats where they are non-pathogenic.
targetString: Ama-HCoV aqhamuka kumalulwane futhi awakubangeli ukugula kuwona.

sourceString: The intermediate reservoir hosts of some HCoVs are also known.
targetString: Ababungazi abamaphakathi bamanye ama-HCoV nabo bayaziwa.

sourceString: Identifying the animal hosts has direct implications in the prevention of human diseases.
targetString: Ukuhlonza ababungazi abayizilwane kunemiphumela eqondile ekuvinjweni kwezifo zabantu.

sourceString: Investigating CoV-host interactions in animals might also derive important insight on CoV pathogenesis in humans.
targetString: Ukucwaninga ukusebenzelana kombungazi we-CoV ezilwaneni kungase kuveze ukuqonda okubalulekile mayelana nokwakheka kwe-CoV kubantu.

sourceString: In this review, we present an overview of the existing knowledge about the seven HCoVs, with a focus on the history of their discovery as well as their zoonotic origins and interspecies transmission.
targetString: Kulesi sibuyekezo, sethula isifinyezo solwazi olukhona kakade mayelana nama-HCoV ayisikhombisa, futhi sizogxila emlandweni wokutholwa kwawo kanye nomsuka wawo we-zoonotic kanye nokuthelelana kwezidalwa ezihlukahlukene.

sourceString: Importantly, we compare and contrast the different HCoVs from a perspective of virus evolution and genome recombination.
targetString: Okubaluleke nakakhulu, siqhathanisa futhi hlukanise ama-HCoV ahlukene ngokombono wokushintsha kwegciwane kanye nokuhlanganiswa kwezakhi zofuzo.

sourceString: The current CoV disease 2019 (COVID-19) epidemic is discussed in this context.
targetString: Umqedazwe wamanje wesifo se-CoV ka-2019 (I-COVID-19) kuxoxwa ngawo kulo mongo.

sourceString: In addition, the requirements for successful host switches and the implications of virus evolution on disease severity are also highlighted.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwalokho, izimfuneko zokushintsha kombungazi ngempumelelo kanye nemiphumela yokushintsha kwegciwane ekubeni bucayi kwesifo nayo iyagqanyiswa.

sourceString: Coronaviruses (CoVs) belong to the family Coronaviridae, which comprises a group of enveloped, positive-sensed, single-stranded RNA viruses.
targetString: Ama-Coronavirus (ama-CoV) ayingxenye yomndeni we-Coronaviridae, owakhiwa iqembu lamagciwane elivalelekile, elinomuzwa-ophozithivu, elinomucu-owodwa we-RNA.

sourceString: These viruses harbouring the largest genome of 26 to 32 kilobases amongst RNA viruses were termed “CoVs” because of their crown-like morphology under electron microscope.
targetString: Lawa magciwane aqukethe i-genome enkulu kunawo wonke engu-26 kuye ku-32 kilobases phakathi kwamagciwane e-RNA abizwa ngokuthi “ama-CoV” ngenxa ye-morphology yawo efana nomqhele ngaphansi kwe-microscope ye-electron.

sourceString: Structurally, CoVs have non-segmented genomes that share a similar organization.
targetString: Ngokwesakhiwo, ama-CoV anama-genome angenazo izingxenye anokuhleleka okufanayo.

sourceString: Approximately two thirds of the genome contain two large overlapping open reading frames (ORF1a and ORF1b), which are translated into the pp1a and pp1ab replicase polyproteins.
targetString: Cishe izingxenye ezintathu ze-genome zinamafreyimu okufunda avulekile amakhulu amabili agibelene (ORF1a ne-ORF1b), ahunyushwe ukuze abe ama-replicase polyprotein e-pp1a ne-pp1ab.

sourceString: The polyproteins are further processed to generate 16 non-structural proteins, designated nsp1~16.
targetString: Ama-polyprotein acutshungulwa ngokwengeziwe ukuze akhe amaphrotheni engeziwe angu-16 angenaso isakhiwo, abizwa ngokuthi i-nsp1~16.

sourceString: The remaining portion of the genome contains ORFs for the structural proteins, including spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N).
targetString: Ingxenye esele ye-genome iqukethe ama-ORF amaphrotheni esakhiwo, okuhlanganisa i-spike (S), imvilophu (E), i-membrane (M) ne-nucleoprotein (N).

sourceString: A number of lineage-specific accessory proteins are also encoded by different lineages of CoVs.
targetString: Inani lamaphrotheni ezinsiza eziqondene nohlu nalo linekhodi yezinhlu ezihlukahlukene zama-CoV.

sourceString: Based on the difference in protein sequences, CoVs are classified into four genera (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV and delta-CoV), among which the beta-CoV genera contains most HCoVs and is subdivided into four lineages (A, B, C and D).
targetString: Ngokusekelwe kumehluko wokulandelana kwamaphrotheni, ama-CoV afakwa ngokwezigaba zemikhakha emine (i-alpha-CoV, i-beta-CoV, i-gamma-CoV ne-delta-CoV), lapho umkhakha we-beta-CoV uqukethe iningi lama-HCoV futhi uhlukaniswe waba izinhlu ezine (A, B, C no-D).

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence has shown that bats and rodents serve as the gene source of most alpha-CoVs and beta-CoVs, while birds are the main reservoir of gamma-CoVs and delta-CoVs.
targetString: Ubufakazi be-phylogenetic bubonise ukuthi amalulwane namagundane awumthombo wezakhi zofuzo zama-alpha-CoV kanye nama-beta-CoV, lapho izinyoni ziwumthombo wama-gamma-CoV nama-delta-CoV.

sourceString: For thousands of years, CoVs have constantly crossed species barriers and some have emerged as important human pathogens.
targetString: Sekunezinkulungwane zeminyaka, ama-CoV eqa ngokuqhubekayo imingcele yezidalwa futhi iningi lawo liphenduke ama-pathogen abalulekile kubantu.

sourceString: To date, seven human CoVs (HCoVs) are known.
targetString: Kuze kube manje, kwaziwa ama-CoV abantu (HCoVs) ayisikhombisa.

sourceString: Among them HCoV-229E and HCoV-NL63 are alpha-CoVs.
targetString: Phakathi kwawo i-HCoV-229E ne-HCoV-NL63 angama-alpha-CoV.

sourceString: The other five beta-CoVs include HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV), Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Amanye ama-beta-CoV ayisihlanu abandakanya i-HCoV-OC43, i-HCoV-HKU1, i-severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV), i-Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) ne-SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63 usually cause mild symptoms, like common cold and/or diarrhea.
targetString: I-HCoV-229E, i-HCoV-OC43, i-HCoV-HKU1 ne-HCoV-NL63 ngokuvamile kubangela izimpawu ezincane, njengomkhuhlane ovamile kanye/noma isifo sohudo.

sourceString: In contrast, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and the newly-identified SARS-CoV-2 are highly pathogenic, causing severe lower respiratory tract infection in relatively more patients with a higher chance to develop acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and extrapulmonary manifestations.
targetString: Ngakolunye uhlangothi, i-SARS-CoV, i-MERS-CoV kanye ne-SARS-CoV-2 esanda kutholwa kubangela ukugula okukhulu, okubangela isifo esibucayi somgudu ongezansi wokuphefumula ezigulini eziningi kakhulu okubangela ithuba eliphakeme lokwakheka kwe-acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) nezinye izifo ezenzeka ngaphandle kwamaphaphu.

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain, B814, was isolated from the nasal discharge of patients with common cold in mid-1960s.
targetString: Uhlobo lokuqala lwe-HCoV-229E, i-B814, lwahlukaniswa kokwakuphuma emakhaleni eziguli ezinomkhuhlane ovamile maphakathi nawo-1960.

sourceString: Since then, more knowledge was accumulated through extensive studies on HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, both of which cause self-limiting symptoms.
targetString: Kusukela ngaleso sikhathi, kwatholwa ulwazi olwengeziwe ngezincwaningo eziningiliziwe ze-HCoV-229E kanye ne-HCoV-OC43, kokubili okubangela izimpawu ezizikhawulayo.

sourceString: Indeed, the concept had been widely accepted that infection with HCoVs is generally harmless until the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: Empeleni, kwakwamukelwe umbono wokuthi ukuphathwa ama-HCoV ngokuvamile akunabo ubungozi kwaze kwaba yilapho kubheduka i-SARS.

sourceString: The SARS outbreak occurred in 2003 is one of the most devastating in current history, infecting over 8,000 people with a crude case fatality of approximately 10%.
targetString: Ukubheduka kwe-SARS okwenzeka ngo-2003 kungokunye okudabukisa kakhulu emlandweni wamanje, yagulisa abantu abangaphezu kuka-8,000 futhi yayinezinga lokufa elicishe libe ngu-10%.

sourceString: Ten years later, the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) outbreak resulted in a persistent epidemic in the Arabian Peninsula with sporadic spreading to the rest of the world.
targetString: Eminyakeni eyishumi kamuva, ukubheduka kwe-Middle East respiratory syndrome (I-MERS) kwaphumela kumqedazwe oqhubekayo ku-Arabian Peninsula okunokubhebhetheka okwenzeka ngezikhathi ezithile kwezinye izingxenye zomhlaba.

sourceString: The 2019 novel HCoV (2019-nCoV), which has subsequently been renamed SARS-CoV-2, is the causative agent of the ongoing epidemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), which has claimed more than 3,120 lives and infected more than 91,000 people as of March 3, 2020.
targetString: I-HCoV entsha ka-2019 (2019-nCoV), kamuva eqanjwe ngokuthi i-SARS-CoV-2, iyi-ejenti eyimbangela yomqedazwe oqhubekayo wesifo se-coronavirus ka-2019 (COVID-19), esibulale abantu abangaphezu kuka-3,120 futhi yathelela abantu abangaphezu kuka-91,000 ngo-March 3, 2020.

sourceString: The alarm has been ringing and the world has to prepare for the coming pandemic of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: I-alamu ibilokhu ikhala futhi umhlaba kufanele ulungele ubhubhane oluzayo lwe-SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: All seven HCoVs have a zoonotic origin from bats, mice or domestic animals.
targetString: Wonke ama-HCoV ayisikhombisa anomsuka we-zoonotic osuka kumalulwane, amagundane noma izilwane ezifuywayo.

sourceString: Multiple lines of evidence support an evolutionary origin of all HCoVs from bats, where viruses are well adapted and non-pathogenic but show great genetic diversity.
targetString: Ubufakazi obuningi busekela umsuka wokuziphendukela kwawo wonke ama-HCoV ukusuka kumalulwane, lapho amagciwane ezivumelanise kahle nesimo futhi engakubangeli khona ukugula kodwa ebonisa ukuhlukahluka kwezakhi zofuzo okuningi.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic has presented enormous medical, scientific, social and moral challenges to China and the world.
targetString: Umqedazwe we-COVID-19 ubeke izinselele ezinkulu zokwelashwa, zesayensi, zomphakathi nezezimilo e-China nasemhlabeni.

sourceString: Tracing the zoonotic origins of HCoVs provides a framework to understand the natural history, driving force and restriction factors of species jumping.
targetString: Ukulandelela imisuka ye-zoonotic yama-HCoV kunikeza uhlaka lokuqonda umlando ongokwemvelo, amandla ashukumisayo nezici zokukhawula zokugxuma kwezidalwa.

sourceString: This might also guide or facilitate the search for the reservoir, intermediate and amplifying animal host(s) of SARS-CoV-2, with important implications in the prevention of future spillovers.
targetString: Lokhu kungaphinde futhi kuqondise noma kusize ekucingeni imbangela, okumaphakathi kanye nokwenziwa kwamakhophi esilwane esingumbungazi(ezingumbungazi) se-SARS-CoV-2, okuzoba nemithelela ebalulekile ekuvinjweni kokudlulela kwesikhathi esizayo.

sourceString: In this review we present an overview of the zoonotic origins, interspecies transmission and pathogenesis of HCoVs.
targetString: Kulesi sibuyekezo sethula isifinyezo semisuka ye-zoonotic, ukuthelelana kwezidalwa ezihlukene kanye ne-pathogenesis yama-HCoV.

sourceString: Particularly, we highlight and discuss the common theme that parental viruses of HCoVs are typically non-pathogenic in their natural reservoir hosts but become pathogenic after interspecies transmission to a new host.
targetString: Ikakhulukazi, sigqamisa futhi sixoxe ngetimu efanayo yokuthi amagciwane angumzali wama-HCoV ngokuvamile awakubangeli ukugula kumbungazi wawo ongokwemvelo kodwa abangela ukugula ngemva kokuthi kuthelelane izidalwa ezihlukahlukene nombungazi omusha.

sourceString: We also review the trend of HCoV evolution in which the increase in transmissibility often comes with the decrease in pathogenicity.
targetString: Siphinde futhi sibuyekeze ithrendi yokuziphendukela kwe-HCoV lapho ukwanda kokuthelelana kuvame ukufika nokwehla kwe-pathogenicity.

sourceString: The outcome of the ongoing SARS-CoV-2 outbreak is also discussed in this context.
targetString: Imiphumela yokubheduka kwe-SARS-CoV-2 eqhubekayo kuphinde kuxoxwe ngayo kulo mongo.

sourceString: Animal CoVs have been known since late 1930s.
targetString: Ama-CoV ezilwane abelokhu aziwa kusukela ekupheleni kwawo-1930.

sourceString: Before the first isolation of HCoV-229E strain B814 from the nasal discharge of patients who had contracted common cold, different CoVs had been isolated in various infected animals, including turkey, mouse, cow, pig, cat and dog.
targetString: Ngaphambi kokuhlukaniswa kokuqala kohlobo lwe-HCoV-229E oluthi B814 kulokho okwaphuma emakhaleni eziguli ezazithole umkhuhlane ovamile, ama-CoV ahlukene ayehlukanisiwe kuzilwane ezithelelekile ezinhlobonhlobo, okuhlanganisa igalikuni, igundane, inkomo, ingulube, ikati nenja.

sourceString: In the past decades, seven HCoVs have been identified.
targetString: Emashumini eminyaka edlule, kutholwe ama-HCoV ayisikhombisa.

sourceString: A brief summary of the history of HCoV discovery in chronological order (Table ​1) would be informative and instructive.
targetString: Isifinyezo esifushane somlando wokutholwa kwama-HCoV ngokulandelana kwawo (Ithebula ​1) ungase uzuzise futhi ufundise.

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain was isolated from the respiratory tract of patients with upper respiratory tract infection in the year of 1966, and was subsequently adapted to grow in WI-38 lung cell lines.
targetString: Uhlobo lokuqala lwe-HCoV-229E lwahlukaniswa kumgudu wokuphefumula weziguli ezinesifo sokuphefumula somgudu ongenhla ngonyaka ka-1966, futhi lwamukelwa ukuze lukhule emigqeni yamaseli amaphaphu e-WI-38.

sourceString: Patients infected with HCoV-229E presented with common cold symptoms, including headache, sneezing, malaise and sore-throat, with fever and cough seen in 10~20% cases.
targetString: Iziguli eziphethwe i-HCoV-229E zazinezimpawu zomkhuhlane ovamile, okubandakanya ikhanda elibuhlungu, ukuthimula, i-malaise nomphimbo obuhlungu, futhi imfiva nokukhwehlela kwabonwa kuziguli ezingu-10~20%.

sourceString: Later in 1967, HCoV-OC43 was isolated from organ culture and subsequent serial passage in brains of suckling mice.
targetString: Kamuva ngo-1967, i-HCoV-OC43 yahlukanisa esithweni sesicubu kanye nomgudu wochungechunge olulandelayo ebuchosheni bamagundane ancelayo.

sourceString: The clinical features of HCoV-OC43 infection appear to be similar to those caused by HCoV-229E, which are symptomatically indistinguishable from infection with other respiratory tract pathogens such as influenza A viruses and rhinoviruses.
targetString: Izici zokwelashwa zesifo se-HCoV-OC43 zibonakala zifana nalezo ezibangelwa yi-HCoV-229E, eyayingahlukaniseki ngokwezimpawu ekuthelelekeni ngezinye izifo zomgudu wokuphefumula ezifana namagciwane emfuluwenza A kanye nama-rhinoviruse.

sourceString: Both HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 are distributed globally, and they tend to be predominantly transmitted during the season of winter in temperate climate.
targetString: Kokubili i-HCoV-229E kanye ne-HCoV-OC43 kusakazeke embulungeni yonke, futhi kuvame ukuthelelana phakathi nenkathi yasebusika esimweni sezulu esikahle.

sourceString: Generally, the incubation time of these two viruses is less than one week, followed by an approximately 2-week illness.
targetString: Ngokuvamile, isikhathi sokufukanyelwa salawa magciwane amabili singaphansi kweviki elilodwa, kulandele cishe amaviki angu-2 okugula.

sourceString: According to a human volunteer study, healthy individuals infected with HCoV-229E developed mild common cold.
targetString: Ngokocwaningo lwamavolontiya angabantu, abantu abaphile kahle abaphethwe i-HCoV-229E babhekana nomkhuhlane omncane ovamile.

sourceString: Only a few immunocompromised patients exhibited severe lower respiratory tract infection.
targetString: Iziguli ezimbalwa kuphela ezinamasosha omzimba acindezelekile kuphela ezabonisa ukuba nesifo esibucayi somgudu wokuphefumula ongezansi.

sourceString: SARS, also known as “atypical pneumonia”, was the first well documented HCoV-caused pandemic in human history and the etiological agent is SARS-CoV, the third HCoV discovered.
targetString: I-SARS, ephinde yaziwe ngokuthi “inyumoniya engavamile”, yaba ubhubhane lokuqala olubangelwa i-HCoV oluqoshiwe emlandweni wabantu futhi iyi-ejenti eyimbangela ye-SARS-CoV, i-HCoV yesithathu etholiwe.

sourceString: The first case of SARS can be traced back to late 2002 in Guangdong Province of China.
targetString: Ukugula kokuqala okubangelwa yi-SARS kungakwazi ukulandelelwa kufike ekupheleni kuka-2002 e-Guangdong Province yase-China.

sourceString: The SARS epidemic resulted in 8,096 reported cases with 774 deaths, spreading across many countries and continents.
targetString: Umqedazwe we-SARS waholela embikweni wabantu abagulayo abangu-8,096 nabantu abangu-774 abafile, abasakazeke emazweni nasemazwekazini amaningi.

sourceString: Apart from the super-spreaders, it was estimated that each case could give rise to approximately two secondary cases, with an incubation period of 4 to 7 days and the peak of viral load appearing on the 10th day of illness.
targetString: Ngaphandle kwababhebhethekise abakhulu, kwalinganiselwa ukuthi umuntu ngamunye ogulayo wayengaba imbangela yokugula kwabanye abantu ababili, yayinkathi yokufukanyelwa yezinsuku ezingu-4 ukuya ku-7 futhi ukuphakama komthamo wegciwane wavela osukwini lika-10 lokugula.

sourceString: Patients infected with SARS-CoV initially present with myalgia, headache, fever, malaise and chills, followed by dyspnea, cough and respiratory distress as late symptoms.
targetString: Iziguli ezitheleleke nge-SARS-CoV ekuqaleni zazibonakala ziphethwe i-myalgia, ikhanda elibuhlungu, imfiva, i-malaise kanye nomkhuhlane, olandelwa yi-dyspnea, ukukhwehlela kanye nengcindezi yokuphefumula njengezimpawu zakamuva.

sourceString: Lymphopenia, deranged liver function tests, and elevated creatine kinase are common laboratory abnormalities of SARS.
targetString: I-lymphopenia, ukuhlolwa kokusebenza kwesibindi okungalungile, kanye ne-creatine kinase ephakeme kuphakathi kwezinto ezingajwayelekile zaselabhorethri ezivamile ngenxa ye-SARS.

sourceString: Diffuse alveolar damage, epithelial cell proliferation and an increase of macrophages are also observed in SARS patients.
targetString: Ukusakazeka komonakalo we-alveolar, ukubhoboka kweseli le-epithelial kanye nokwanda kwama-macrophage kuphawuliwe ezigulini ze-SARS.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of patients subsequently require intensive care and mechanical ventilation.
targetString: Cishe iziguli ezingu-20-30% zidinga ukunakekelwa okubucayi nokufakwa komoya ngomshini.

sourceString: In addition to lower respiratory tract, multiple organs including gastrointestinal tract, liver and kidney can also be infected in these severe cases, usually accompanied with a cytokine storm, which might be lethal particularly in immunocompromised patients.
targetString: Ngaphezu komgudu wokuphefumula ongezansi, izitho zomzimba eziningi ezibandakanya umgudu we-gastrointestinal, isibindi nezinso nazo zingatheleleka kulezi zimo ezibucayi, ngokuvamile ezihambisana nesiphepho se-cytokine, esingase sibulale ikakhulukazi ezigulini ezinamasosha omzimba afakwe engcupheni.

sourceString: The virus was first isolated from the open lung biopsy of a relative of the index patient who travelled to Hong Kong from Guangzhou.
targetString: Igciwane laqala lahlukaniswa ekuhlinzweni kwamaphaphu okuvulekile kwesihlobo sesiguli sokuqala esahamba saya e-Hong Kong sisuka e-Guangzhou.

sourceString: Since then, tremendous efforts have been dedicated to HCoV research.
targetString: Kusukela ngaleso sikhathi, kuye kwenziwa imizamo emikhulu ephathelene nocwaningo lwe-HCoV.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 was isolated from a 7-month-old child from the Netherlands during late 2004.
targetString: I-HCoV-NL63 yahlukaniswa enganeni enobudala obuyizinyanga ezingu-7 yase-Netherlands ngasekupheleni kuka-2004.

sourceString: It was initially found to be prevalent in young children, the elderly and immunocompromised patients with respiratory illnesses.
targetString: Kwaqale kwatholwa ukuthi yayandile ezinganeni ezincane, kubantu asebekhulile neziguli ezinamasosha omzimba afakwe engcupheni ezinezifo zokuphefumula.

sourceString: Presentation of coryza, conjunctivitis, fever, and bronchiolitis is common in the disease caused by HCoV-NL63.
targetString: Ukutholakala kwe-coryza, i-conjunctivitis, imfiva, kanye ne-bronchiolitis kuyinto evamile esifweni esibangelwa yi-HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: Another independent study described the isolation of the same virus from a nasal specimen from an 8-month-old boy suffering from pneumonia in the Netherlands.
targetString: Olunye ucwaningo oluzimele lachaza ukuhlukaniswa kwegciwane elifanayo elisuka kusicubu samakhala somfana onezinyanga ezingu-8 ubudala ophethwe inyumoniya e-Netherlands.

sourceString: Although it was identified in Netherlands, it is actually distributed globally.
targetString: Nakuba yatholwa e-Netherlands, empeleni isakazeke emhlabeni wonke.

sourceString: It has been estimated that HCoV-NL63 accounts for approximately 4.7% of common respiratory diseases, and its peak incidence occurs during early summer, spring and winter.
targetString: Kuye kwalinganiselwa ukuthi i-HCoV-NL63 imelele cishe u-4.7% wezifo ezivamile zokuphefumula, futhi isigameko sayo esiphakeme senzeka ekuqaleni kwehlobo, entwasahlobo nasebusika.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 is associated with obstructive laryngitis, also known as croup.
targetString: I-HCoV-NL63 ihlotshaniswa ne-obstructive laryngitis, eyaziwa futhi ngokuthi i-croup.

sourceString: In the same year, HCoV-HKU1 was isolated from a 71-year-old man who had been hospitalized with pneumonia and bronchiolitis in Hong Kong.
targetString: Ngonyaka ofanayo, i-HCoV-HKU1 yahlukaniswa kumuntu wesilisa oneminyaka yobudala engu-71 owayelaliswe esibhedlela ephethwe inyumoniya ne-bronchiolitis e-Hong Kong.

sourceString: Besides community-acquired pneumonia and bronchiolitis, HCoV-HKU1 was reported to be associated with acute asthmatic exacerbation.
targetString: Ngaphandle kwenyumoniya etholakala emphakathini kanye ne-bronchiolitis, i-HCoV-HKU1 yabikwa ukuthi ihlobene ne-acute asthmatic exacerbation.

sourceString: Similar to HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 was found worldwide, causing mild respiratory diseases.
targetString: Ngokufana ne-HCoV-NL63, i-HCoV-229E kanye ne-HCoV-OC43, i-HCoV-HKU1 yatholakala emhlabeni wonke, ibangela izifo zokuphefumula ezincane.

sourceString: All these four community-acquired HCoVs have been well adapted to humans and are generally less likely to mutate to cause highly pathogenic diseases, though accidents did occur for unknown reasons as in the rare case of a more virulent subtype of HCoV-NL63, which has recently been reported to cause severe lower respiratory tract infection in China.
targetString: Wonke lawa ma-HCoV atholakala emphakathini azivumelanise kahle nabantu futhi ngokuvamile anamathuba amancane okushintsha ukuze abe izifo ezi-pathogenic kakhulu, nakuba izingozi zenzeka ngenxa yezizathu ezingaziwa njengasesimweni esingavamile sohlobo olungaphansi lwe-HCoV-NL63 ebulala kakhulu, okubikwe ukuthi ibangela isifo esibucayi somgudu wokuphefumula ongezansi e-China.

sourceString: Generally, when these HCoVs acquire the abilities to transmit efficiently and to maintain themselves continuously within humans, they also become less virulent or pathogenic.
targetString: Ngokuvamile, lapho lawa ma-HCoV ethola amakhono okuthelela kalula futhi azigcine esimweni ngokuqhubekayo ngaphakathi kwabantu, aphinde abulale noma abe-pathogenic kancane.

sourceString: MERS-CoV was first isolated in 2012 from the lung of a 60-year-old patient who developed acute pneumonia and renal failure in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: I-MERS-CoV yaqale yahlukaniswa ngo-2012 ephasheni lesiguli esineminyaka yobudala engu-60 esaphathwa inyumoniya ebucayi kanye nokuhluleka kwezinso e-Saudi Arabia.

sourceString: Whereas most of the laboratory-confirmed cases originate from the Middle East, imported cases with occasional secondary spreads to close contacts have been reported in various European countries and Tunisia.
targetString: Nakuba iningi lezimo eziqinisekiswe elabhorethri zisuka e-e-Middle East, izimo ezingenisiwe zisakazekela kwabathintwayo abaseduze ababikwe emazweni ahlukahlukene ase-Europea nase-Tunisia.

sourceString: Another secondary outbreak occurred in South Korea in 2015 with 186 confirmed cases.
targetString: Okunye ukubheduka kwesibili kwenzeka e-South Korea ngo-2015 okunabantu abangu-186 abaqinisekisiwe.

sourceString: Clinical manifestations of MERS resemble those of SARS, characterized by progressive acute pneumonia.
targetString: Ukubonakala kwezokwelashwa kwe-MERS kufana nalokho kwe-SARS, okuphawulwa yinyumoniya ebucayi ethuthukayo.

sourceString: Unlike SARS, many patients with MERS also developed acute renal failure, which is thus far unique for MERS among HCoV-caused diseases.
targetString: Ngokungafani ne-SARS, iziguli eziningi eziphethwe i-MERS zaphathwa ukuhluleka kwezinso okubucayi, okwamanje okuyinto ehlukile ku-MERS phakathi kwezifo ezibangelwa i-HCoV.

sourceString: More than 30% of patients present with gastrointestinal symptoms, such as diarrhea and vomiting.
targetString: Iziguli ezingaphezu kuka-30% zinezimpawu ze-gastrointestinal, ezifana nesifo sohudo nokuhlanza.

sourceString: As of February 14, 2020, over 2500 laboratory confirmed cases were reported with a high case fatality of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV one of the most devastating viruses known to humans.
targetString: Kusukela ngo-February 14, 2020, ukugula okuqinisekiswe elabhorethri okungaphezu kuka-2500 kwabikwa okunezigameko zokufa eziphakeme ezingu-34.4%, okwenza i-MERS-CoV elinye lamagciwane ayingozi kakhulu kubantu.

sourceString: During middle to late December 2019, clusters of pneumonia patients retrospectively known to be associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection were detected in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: Kusukela maphakathi no-December 2019 kuye ekupheleni kwawo, iziguli eziningi ezaziphethwe inyumoniya okwaziwa ukuthi ihlobene nesifo se-SARS-CoV-2 zatholwa e-Wuhan, e-Hubei Province, e-China.

sourceString: World Health Organization declared the ongoing outbreak of lower respiratory tract infection caused by SARS-CoV-2 a Public Health Emergency of International Concern and also named the disease COVID-19.
targetString: I-World Health Organization yabiza ukubheduka kwesifo somgudu wokuphefumula ongezansi esibangelwa i-SARS-CoV-2 ngokuthi Isimo Esiphuthumayo Sempilo Yomphakathi Okufanele Sikhathaze Amazwe Omhlaba futhi qamba isifo ngokuthi i-COVID-19.

sourceString: As of March 3, 2020, 90,053 cases have been confirmed worldwide, with a crude case fatality of 3.4%.
targetString: Ngo-March 3, 2020, kwabikwa ukuthi kunabantu abagulayo abaqinisekisiwe abangu-90,053 emhlabeni jikelele, nezinga lokufa elingu-3.4%.

sourceString: Notably, the case fatality in Hubei, China is 4.2%, whereas the one outside of it is 1.2%.
targetString: Ngokuphawulekayo, inani lokufa e-Hubei, e-China lingu-4.2%, kuyilapho elinye elingaphandle kwayo lingu-1.2%.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 causes severe respiratory infection like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, presented as fever, cough and dyspnea.
targetString: I-SARS-CoV-2 ibangela isifo sokuphefumula esibucayi esifana ne-SARS-CoV kanye ne-MERS-CoV, esifana nemfiva, ukukhwehlela ne-dyspnea.

sourceString: Diarrhea is also seen in some patients.
targetString: Iziguli ziphinde ziphathwe isifo sohudo.

sourceString: Pneumonia is one of the most severe symptoms and can progress rapidly to acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Inyumoniya ingenye yezimpawu ezibucayi futhi ingathuthuka ngokushesha ibe yi-acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are very similar due to high nucleotide sequence homology of 82%, they cluster into different branches in the phylogenetic tree.
targetString: Nakuba i-SARS-CoV kanye ne-SARS-CoV-2 kucishe kufane kakhulu ngenxa yokwakheka okufanayo kokulandelana kwe-nucleotide okuphakeme okungu-82%, kunamaqembu ahlukene emagatsheni esihlahla se-phylogenetic.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is apparently less pathogenic but more transmissible compared to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: I-SARS-CoV-2 ibonakala i-pathogenic kancane kodwa ithelelana kakhulu uma iqhathaniswa ne-SARS-CoV kanye ne-MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Asymptomatic subjects infected with SARS-CoV-2 have been reported and might contribute to its rapid spreading around the world.
targetString: Kubikwe ukuthi kunabantu abangenazo izimpawu abaphethwe i-SARS-CoV-2 futhi bangase babe nomthelela wokubhebhetheka kwayo ngokushesha emhlabeni wonke.

sourceString: Comparing and contrasting SARS-CoV-2 with the other six HCoVs reveal similarities and differences of great interest.
targetString: Ukuqhathanisa nokuhlukanisa i-SARS-CoV-2 namanye ama-HCoV ayisithupha kuveza ukufana nokuhluka okuthakazelisa kakhulu.

sourceString: First, the incubation period and the duration of the course of HCoV disease are very similar.
targetString: Okokuqala, inkathi yokufukanyelwa kanye nobude besikhathi sokuqhubeka kwesifo se-HCoV kufana kakhulu.

sourceString: In this regard, SARS-CoV-2 follows the general trend of the other six HCoVs.
targetString: Ngokuqondene nalokhu, i-SARS-CoV-2 ilandela ithrendi evamile yamanye ama-HCoV ayisithupha.

sourceString: Second, the severity of symptoms of COVID-19 lies between SARS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs (i.e. HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63).
targetString: Okwesibili, ubucayi bezimpawu ze-COVID-19 buphakathi kwe-SARS-CoV kanye nama-HCoV amane atholwa emphakathini (okungukuthi i-HCoV-229E, i-HCoV-OC43, i-HCoV-HKU1 kanye ne-HCoV-NL63).

sourceString: On one hand, SARS-CoV-2 infection exhibits features that are more commonly seen during infection with community-acquired HCoVs, including the presentation of non-specific, mild or even no symptoms.
targetString: Ngakolunye uhlangothi, isifo se-SARS-CoV-2 sibonisa izici ezivame ukubonwa phakathi nokutheleleka ngama-HCoV atholwa emphakathini, okubandakanya ukungabikhona kwezimpawu ezicacile, izimpawu ezincane noma ukungabikhona kwezimpawu.

sourceString: On the other hand, a small subset of severe cases of COVID-19 can also be seen as in the case of SARS-CoV infection, although the ratio is a bit lower.
targetString: Ngakolunye uhlangothi, isethi engaphansi encane yezimo ezibucayi ze-COVID-19 ingabonwa futhi njengasesimweni sesifo se-SARS-CoV, nakuba isilinganiso siphansi kancane.

sourceString: Third, the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 also shows interesting patterns characteristic of both community-acquired HCoVs and SARS-CoV.
targetString: Okwesithathu, ukuthelelana kwe-SARS-CoV-2 kuphinde kubonise amaphethini athakazelisayo anesici sawo womabili ama-HCoV atholakala emphakathini kanye ne-SARS-CoV.

sourceString: On one hand, the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 is at least as high as that of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: Ngakolunye uhlangothi, ukudluliswa kwe-SARS-CoV-2 kuphakeme njengokwama-HCoV atholwe emphakathini.

sourceString: On the other hand, it remains to be verified whether the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 decreases after passages in humans as in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: Ngakolunye uhlangothi, kusazoqinisekiswa ukuthi ukudluliselwa kwe-SARS-CoV-2 kuyancipha yini kubantu njengasesimweni se-SARS-CoV ne-MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Finally, same as the other HCoVs, SARS-CoV-2 can be detected in fecal samples.
targetString: Okokugcina, ngokufana namanye ama-HCoV, i-SARS-CoV-2 ingatholwa kumasampula endle.

sourceString: Whether fecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2 plays an important role as in the case of SARS-CoV at least under some circumstance remains to be clarified by future studies.
targetString: Ukuthi ukudluliswa ngendle-ngomlomo kwe-SARS-CoV-2 kudlala indima ebalulekile yini uma kuziwa ku-SARS-CoV ngaphansi kwezimo ezithile kusazocaciswa izingcwaningo zesikhathi esizayo.

sourceString: It is also of particularly great interest to see whether SARS-CoV-2 might exhibit seasonality as in the cases of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: Kuphinde kuthakazelise kakhulu ukubona ukuthi ingabe i-SARS-CoV-2 izobonisa ukuvela ngezinkathi ezithile zonyaka njengoba kunjalo ngama-HCoV atholakala emphakathini.

sourceString: Nevertheless, the features of SARS-CoV-2 including its transmissibility, pathogenicity and sustainable spreading after passages in humans will be influential on the ultimate fate of the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19.
targetString: Noma kunjalo, izci ze-SARS-CoV-2 okubandakanya ukutheleleka kwayo, i-pathogenicity nokubhebhetheka okulondolozekayo ngemva kokudlulela kubantu kuzoba nethonya esiphethweni sokugcina sokubheduka okuqhubekayo kwe-COVID-19.

sourceString: All four community-acquired HCoVs causing mild symptoms have been well adapted to humans.
targetString: Wonke ama-HCoV atholwa emphakathini abangela izimpawu ezincane azivumelanise kahle nabantu.

sourceString: From another perspective, it might also be true that humans have been well adapted to these four HCoVs.
targetString: Ngokomunye umbono, kungase futhi kube yiqiniso ukuthi abantu bazivumelanise kahle nalawa ma-HCoV amane.

sourceString: In other words, both could be the survivors of ancient HCoV pandemics.
targetString: Ngamanye amazwi, kokubili kungenzeka ukuthi kwasinda kubhubhane lwe-HCoV yasendulo.

sourceString: HCoVs that cause severe diseases in humans and humans who developed severe HCoV diseases have been eliminated.
targetString: Ama-HCoV abangela izifo ezibucayi kubantu kanye nabantu abaphathwa izifo ze-HCoV ebucayi abasekho.

sourceString: For this to happen, HCoVs have to replicate in humans to sufficient extent to allow the accumulation of adaptive mutations that counteract host restriction factors.
targetString: Ukuze kwenzeke lokhu, ama-HCoV kufanele aphindeke kubantu ngokwezinga elanele ukuze kuvunyelwe ukukhula koshintsho oluvumelana nezimo okuphikisana nezici zokukhawulwa kombungazi.

sourceString: In this sense, the longer the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak persists and the more people that it infects, the greater chance that it will fully adapt to humans.
targetString: Ngale ndlela, uma ukubheduka kwe-SARS-CoV-2 kuphikelela futhi ithelela abantu abaningi, kuzoba nethuba elikhulu lokuthi izozivumelanisa kakhulu nabantu.

sourceString: If it adapts well, its transmission in humans would be difficult to stop by quarantine or other infection control measures.
targetString: Uma izivumelanisa kahle kakhulu, ukuthelela kwayo abantu kungabanzima ukukuvimba ngokuzivalela noma ezinye izindlela zokulawula ukutheleleka.

sourceString: For many years, the four community-acquired CoVs circulate in human populations, triggering common cold in immunocompetent subjects.
targetString: Sekuyiminyaka eminingi, ama-CoV amane atholwa emphakathini ejikeleza emphakathini wabantu, okubangela umkhuhlane ovamile kubantu abanokusabela okufanele kwamasosha omzimba.

sourceString: These viruses do not need an animal reservoir.
targetString: Lawa magciwane awadingi umthombo oyisilwane.

sourceString: In contrast, highly pathogenic SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV have not adapted to humans well and their transmission within humans cannot be sustained.
targetString: Ngokuphambene nalokho, i-SARS-CoV kanye ne-MERS-CoV e-pathogenic kakhulu awakazivumelanisi kahle nabantu futhi ukuthelelana kwawo ngaphakathi kwabantu akukwazi ukulondolozwa.

sourceString: They need to maintain and propagate in their zoonotic reservoirs and seek the chance to spillover to susceptible human targets, possibly via one or more intermediate and amplifying hosts.
targetString: Adinga ukugcina esimweni futhi akhule kumthombo wawo we-zoonotic futhi afuna ithuba lokudlulela kuzisulu ezingachayeka, cishe ngombungazi omaphakathi oyedwa noma ngaphezulu futhi kukhuliswe ababungazi.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 has features that are similar to both SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: I-SARS-CoV-2 inezici ezifana nakho kokubili i-SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV kanye nama-HCoV amane atholwa emphakathini.

sourceString: It is highly transmissible like community-acquired HCoVs, at least for the time being.
targetString: Itheleleka kakhulu njengama-HCoV atholwa emphakathini, okungenani kusidalwa sokuqala.

sourceString: However, it is more pathogenic than community-acquired HCoVs and less pathogenic than SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV.
targetString: Nokho, i-pathogenic kakhulu kunama-HCoV atholwa emphakathini futhi ine-pathogenic encane ku-SARS-CoV noma i-MERS-CoV.

sourceString: It remains to be seen whether it will adapt fully to humans and circulate within humans without a reservoir or intermediate animal host.
targetString: Kusazobonwa ukuthi izozivumelanisa ngokugcwele yini nabantu futhi ijikeleze ngaphandle komthombo noma umbungazi wesilwane omaphakathi.

sourceString: Before discussing the animal origins of HCoVs, it will serve us well to discuss the definitions and characteristics of evolutionary, natural, reservoir, intermediate and amplifying hosts of HCoVs.
targetString: Ngaphambi kokuthi kuxoxwe ngemisuka eyizilwane yama-HCoV, kuzosiza ukuthi sixoxe ngezincazelo nezici zababungazi boshintsho, abangokwemvelo, abawumthombo, abamaphakathi nabokukhulisa ama-HCoV.

sourceString: An animal serves as the evolutionary host of an HCoV if it harbours a closely related ancestor sharing high homology at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: Isilwane siba umbungazi woshintsho we-HCoV uma sifukamele ukhokho ohlobene ngokuseduze okwabelwana naye nge-homology ephakeme ezingeni lokulandelana kwe-nucleotide.

sourceString: The ancestral virus is usually well adapted and non-pathogenic in this host.
targetString: Igciwane eliwukhokho livame ukuzivumelanisa kahle futhi alikubangeli ukugula kulo mbungazi.

sourceString: Likewise, a reservoir host harbours HCoV continuously and for long term.
targetString: Ngokufanayo, umbungazi owumthombo ufukamela i-HCoV ngokuqhubekayo futhi isikhathi eside.

sourceString: In both cases, the hosts are naturally infected and are the natural hosts of HCoV or its parental virus.
targetString: Kuzo zombili izimo, ababungazi batheleleka ngokwemvelo futhi bangababungazi abangokwemvelo be-HCoV noma igciwane layo elingumzali.

sourceString: In contrast, if the HCoV is newly introduced to an intermediate host right before or around its introduction to humans, it is not well adapted to the new host and is often pathogenic.
targetString: Ngokuphambene nalokho, uma i-HCoV yethulwa kabusha kumbungazi omaphakathi ngaphambili noma ngasekwethulweni kubantu, ayizivumelanisile kahle nombungazi omusha futhi ngokuvamile ibangela ukugula.

sourceString: This intermediate host can serve as the zoonotic source of human infection and play the role of an amplifying host by allowing the virus to replicate transiently and then transmitting it to humans to amplify the scale of human infection.
targetString: Lo mbungazi omaphakathi angase abe umthombo oyi-zoonotic yokutheleleka kwabantu futhi adlale indima yokukhulisa umbungazi okuvumela igciwane ukuthi liphindeke isikhashana futhi lidluliselwe kubantu ukuze kukhuliswe izinga lokutheleleka kwabantu.

sourceString: An HCoV can undergo a dead-end infection if it cannot sustain its transmission within the intermediate host.
targetString: I-HCoV ingabhekana nokutheleleka kokugcina uma ingakwazi ukulondoloza ukutheleleka kwayo ngaphakathi kombungazi omaphakathi.

sourceString: On the contrary, HCoVs can also adapt to the intermediate host and even establish long-term endemicity.
targetString: Ngokuphambene nalokho, ama-HCoV ayakwazi ukuzivumelanisa nombungazi omaphakathi futhi aze asungule ne-endemicity yesikhathi eside.

sourceString: In this case, the intermediate host becomes a natural reservoir host.
targetString: Kulesi simo, umbungazi omaphakathi uba umbungazi owumthombo ongokwemvelo.

sourceString: Epidemiological data revealed retrospectively that the index case of SARS had a contact history with game animals.
targetString: Idatha ye-epidemiological yabonisa ukuthi lapho kubhekwa emuva ukuthi isiguli esiyinkomba se-SARS sasinomlando wokuxhumana nezilwane ezizingelwayo.

sourceString: Subsequent seroprevalence investigations indicated that animal traders had a higher prevalence of anti-SARS-CoV IgG compared with that of the general population.
targetString: Izingcwaningo ze-seroprevalence ezalandela zabonisa ukuthi abahwebi bezilwane babe ne-IgG emelene SARS-CoV ephakeme uma beqhathaniswa nesibalo sabantu abavamile.

sourceString: Masked palm civets (Paguma larvata) and a racoon dog in live animal markets were first identified to carry SARS-CoV-like viruses that are almost identical to SARS-CoV.
targetString: Ama-masked palm civet (I-paguma larvata) kanye nenja ye-racoon ezimakethe zezilwane eziphilayo kwatholwa ukuthi athwala amagciwane afana nawe-SARS-CoV acishe afane ne-SARS-CoV.

sourceString: This was indirectly supported by the fact that no further SARS was reported after killing all civets in the markets.
targetString: Lokhu kwasekelwa ngokungaqondile iqiniso lokuthi ayikho i-SARS eyengeziwe eyabikwa ngemva kokubulawa kwawo wonke ama-civet ezimakethe.

sourceString: However, it has been reported that masked palm civets from the wild or farms without exposure to the live animal markets were largely negative for SARS-CoV, suggesting that masked palm civets might only serve as the intermediate amplifying host but not the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Nokho, kuye kwabikwa ukuthi ama-masked palm civet asendle noma emapulazini angakaze achayeke ezimakethe zezilwane eziphilayo ayenegethivu uma kuziwa ku-SARS-CoV, okusikisela ukuthi ama-masked palm civet angase abe umbungazi wokukhulisa omaphakathi kodwa hhayi umthombo ongokwemvelo we-SARS-CoV.
