targetString: Ziphe isikhathi esengeziwe sokuba uxhume, ikakhulukazi uma uxhuma usuka endizeni esuka kwelinye izwe uya endizeni yendawo futhi ikakhulukazi uma umzila wakho uhlanganisa izwe elithinteke kakhulu.

sourceString: Screenings, temperature checks, extra paperwork, and the associated waiting around can add minutes or hours before you're allowed to continue on your journey.
targetString: Ukuhlungwa, ukuhlolwa kwezinga lokushisa komzimba, ukugcwalisa amaphepha, nokulinda okuhlobene nakho kunganezela imizuzu noma amahora ngaphambi kokuba uvunyelwe ukuba uqhubeke nohambo lwakho.

sourceString: You may find it harder than usual to buy a ticket to or from a destination subject to warnings and restrictions.
targetString: Ungakuthola kunzima kunokuvamile ukuthenga ithikithi lokuya noma lokubuya endaweni ngenxa yezixwayiso nemithetho evimbelayo.

sourceString: This is a real concern if you're trying to get out of an affected area.
targetString: Lokhu kuyinkinga yangempela uma uzama ukuphuma endaweni ethintekile.

sourceString: For instance, most aggregators are not selling tickets from China to the United States (presumably to avoid falling afoul of restrictions and being on the hook for a passenger's flight out).
targetString: Ngokwesibonelo, amabhizinisi amaningi awadayisi amathikithi okusuka eChina uye e-United States (cishe ukuze kugwenywe ukungena enkingeni yokwephula imithetho nokubambezeleka ekutholeni indiza ephumayo).

sourceString: To buy a ticket for an itinerary like this, you may have to contact the airline or use a lesser-known aggregator.
targetString: Ukuze uthenge ithikithi lomzila onjengalona, kungase kudingeke uthintane namahhovisi endiza noma usebenzise ibhizinisi elingaziwa kahle.

sourceString: Another possibility is to buy two separate tickets (for instance, a ticket from China to Cambodia and a second ticket from Cambodia to the U.S.), but be careful you won't get quarantined or lose your luggage in between.
targetString: Okunye ongakwenza ukuthenga amathikithi amabili ahlukene (ngokwesibonelo, ithikithi elisuka eChina liya eCambodia nethikithi lesibili elisuka eCambodia liya e-U.S.), kodwa qikelela ukuthi ngeke uhlaliswe wedwa noma ulahlekelwe izikhwama zakho lapho uxhuma.

sourceString: Connecting flights can be a problem.
targetString: Ukuxhuma izindiza kungaba inkinga.

sourceString: The risk of getting stuck in the connection city is higher than usual right now, due to delays for screening and testing as well as extensive cancellations.
targetString: Ingozi yokubambezeleka edolobheni oxhuma kulo iphakeme kunokuvamile njengamanje, ngenxa yesikhathi esidleka ekuhlungeni nasekuhlolweni nabantu abaningi abakhanselayo.

sourceString: Connecting in an affected area may lead to entry restrictions later on, and if you've been in an affected area recently some countries won't even let you change planes.
targetString: Ukuxhuma endaweni ethintekile kungaholela emithethweni yokungena kamuva, futhi uma ubusendaweni ethintekile muva nje amanye amazwe ngeke akuvumele ngisho nokuba ushintshe izindiza.

sourceString: On certain itineraries there is a risk of getting quarantined somewhere along the way.
targetString: Kweminye imizila kunengozi yokuba uhlaliswe wedwa ndawana thize endleleni.

sourceString: So book a direct flight if you can, and if not, think carefully about where to connect.
targetString: Ngakho bhukha indiza ehamba iqonde uma ukwazi, futhi uma ungakwazi, cabangisisa ngokuthi uzoxhuma kuphi.

sourceString: In uncertain times, plans can change.
targetString: Ezikhathini ezingaqinisekile, izinhlelo zingashintsha.

sourceString: Many embassies and consulates have evacuated nonessential staff, and some have shut down operations completely.
targetString: Amanxusa amaningi asize izisebenzi eziningi ezenza imisebenzi engadingekile ukuba zihambe, futhi amanye ayivalile imisebenzi ngokuphelele.

sourceString: Emergency assistance should still be available, though it's possible you may have to contact a further-away consulate if your local one has shut down.
targetString: Usizo oluphuthumayo kufanele lutholakale, nakuba kusengenzeka ukuthi kungase kudingeke uthintane nenxusa eliqhelile uma elakini livalile.

sourceString: If you have been stranded due to the pandemic, your nearest consulate may be able to help you find a flight home, arrange an emergency loan so you can buy a ticket, or provide an emergency passport.
targetString: Uma uye wavaleleka ngenxa yalo mqedazwe, inxusa eliseduze nawe lingakwazi ukukusiza uthole indiza eya ekhaya, ulungiselele ukuboleka imali yezimo eziphuthumayo ukuze uthenge ithikithi, noma uthole iphasipoti yezimo eziphuthumayo.

sourceString: At the very least they can keep you informed about the local situation and notify you about recently introduced travel requirements and restrictions.
targetString: Okunye elingakwenza ukukunika ulwazi ngesimo sendawo futhi likutshele ngezimfuneko nemithetho yamuva enezelwe yokuhamba.

sourceString: Ordinary consular services such as visa and passport processing may be suspended or restricted to urgent need, depending on the location and the consulate.
targetString: Amasevisi avamile amanxusa njengokuphrosesa ama-visa namaphasipoti angamiswa kancane noma enziwe kuphela uma kunesidingo esiphuthumayo, kuye ngendawo nangenxusa.

sourceString: Although some people call the disease "Wuhan pneumonia" (武汉(漢)肺炎/武肺), "Wuhan disease", or "Chinese virus", the use of these terms is considered racist in China and by many people of Chinese origin.
targetString: Nakuba abantu abathize bebiza leli gciwane ngokuthi "yi-pneumonia yaseWuhan" (武汉(漢)肺炎/武肺), "isifo saseWuhan", noma "igciwane laseChina", ukusetshenziswa kwala magama kubhekwa njengokuwubandlululo eChina nakubantu abaningi abavela eChina.

sourceString: It is still common to refer the disease as "Wuhan pneumonia" or "Chinese virus" in places like Hong Kong and Taiwan.
targetString: Kuseyinto evamile ukubhekisela esifweni ngokuthi "yi-pneumonia yaseWuhan" noma "igciwane laseChina" ezindaweni ezinjengeHong Kong neTaiwan.

sourceString: To be safe, use location-neutral terms when referring to the disease, such as "COVID-19", "novel coronavirus", or just "the virus" or "the pandemic".
targetString: Ukuze uphephe, sebenzisa amagama angagaguli indawo lapho ukhuluma ngalesi sifo, njengelithi "COVID-19", "novel coronavirus", noma nje ukuthi "igciwane" noma "umqedazwe".

sourceString: Particularly in developing countries where law enforcement are poorly trained, enforcement of curfew, lockdown or stay-at-home orders are often brutal, often using forces not proportionate against crowds.
targetString: Emazweni asathuthuka ngokukhethekile lapho abezomthetho bengaqeqeshwa kahle khona, ukubekwa komthetho wewashi, i-lockdown noma imithetho yokuhlala ekhaya ngokuvamile iqinile, ngokuvamile kusetshenziswa izindlela ezinamandla kunezixuku.

sourceString: Comply with these orders, and avoid crowds in public.
targetString: Hambisana nale mithetho, futhi ugweme izixuku emphakathini.

sourceString: As a result of the coronavirus pandemic, xenophobia has risen in many countries, primarily but not exclusively targeting people perceived to be Chinese.
targetString: Ngenxa yomqedazwe we-coronavirus, ukuxoshwa kwabantu bakwamanye amazwe kuyanda emazweni amaningi, ikakhulukazi kodwa hhayi kuphela kubantu ababhekwa njengabaseChina.

sourceString: There has been a worldwide spike in racist incidents targeting people of East Asian origin, including in major cities such as New York, London and San Francisco.
targetString: Sekube nezigameko ezandayo emhlabeni wonke zobandlululo olubhekiswe kubantu baseMpumalanga Asia, okubandakanya amadolobha amakhulu njengeNew York, iLondon neSan Francisco.

sourceString: In Hong Kong, Sinophobia, which was already high to begin with, has intensified as a result of the pandemic, with the result that many shops and restaurants are now denying service to mainland Chinese customers and banning Mandarin speakers from their premises (with the exception of Taiwanese).
targetString: EHong Kong, Inzondo ngabantu baseChina, ebikade iyinsakavukela, iye yadlondlobala ngenxa yalo mqedazwe, umphumela waba ukuthi izitolo eziningi nezitolo zokudlela manje ziyakwenqabela ukudayisela amakhasimende ase-mainland China futhi avimbela abantu abakhuluma isiMandarin ekungeneni ezindaweni zabo (ngaphandle kwabantu baseTaiwan).

sourceString: Levels of xenophobia have also risen in East Asia, with some restaurants and other businesses in Japan and China refusing service to foreign customers.
targetString: Amazinga okuxoshwa kwabantu bakwamanye amazwe aye anda eMpumalanga Asia, kanti izitolo zokudlela namanye amabhizinisi eJapan naseChina ziyenqaba ukudayisela amakhasimende akwamanye amazwe.

sourceString: In China, there have been incidents of foreigners being refused rooms by hotel staff, and foreign residents, particularly black people, being kicked out of their apartments on short notice by their landlords.
targetString: EChina, sekube nezigameko zabantu bakwamanye amazwe abenqatshelwa amagumbi yizisebenzi zasemahhotela, futhi izakhamuzi zakwamanye amazwe, ikakhulukazi abantu abansundu, ziyakhishwa ezindlini zazo zingazange zixwayiswe abanikazi bendawo.

sourceString: Sources for further information on the coronavirus outbreak include:
targetString: Imithombo yolwazi olwengeziwe ngomqedazwe we-coronavirus ibandakanya:

sourceString: The US government Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
targetString: Izikhungo Zikahulumeni wase-US Zokulawula Nokuvimbela Isifo

sourceString: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (daily updates)
targetString: Isikhungo sase-Europe Sokuvimbela Nokulawula Isifo (izibuyekezo zansuku zonke)

sourceString: United Kingdom government, - Foreign and Commonwealth Office advice for Travellers
targetString: Uhulumeni wase-United Kingdom, - iseluleko Sezihambi seHhovisi Lakwamanye Amazwe neCommonwealth

sourceString: An online map and dashboard from the John Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering with live updates
targetString: Ibalazwe eliku-inthanethi nedeshibhodi evela e-John Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering enezibuyekezo ezivela bukhoma

sourceString: Partial lists of entry restrictions from IATA and The New York Times
targetString: Izinhlu ezingaphelele zemithetho yokungena ezivela e-IATA naku-The New York Times

sourceString: A variety of misinformation and conspiracy theories about the virus are being promoted online and even by some government officials, so be careful which sources you check for information.
targetString: Ulwazi oluningi olungamanga namaqhinga ngegciwane kuvela kaningi ku-inthanethi futhi kuvela ngisho nakwezinye izikhulu zikahulumeni, ngakho qaphela ukuthi imiphi imithombo ofuna kuyo ulwazi.

sourceString: Ensure that all information and advice you receive has been backed by reputable doctors and scientists.
targetString: Qiniseka ukuthi lonke ulwazi nezeluleko ozitholayo kuyasekelwa ngodokotela nososayensi abethenjwayo.

sourceString: In a crisis, it's natural to want to keep following the latest updates, but it may be better for your mental health to moderate the amount of news that you look at, and stick to reliable news sources.
targetString: Esimweni esibucayi, kungokwemvelo ukufuna ukulandelela izindaba zamuva, kodwa kungakuhle ngengqondo yakho ukuba ulinganisele inani lezindaba ozibukelayo, futhi ugxile emithonjeni yezindaba enokwethenjelwa.

sourceString: If you normally watch the news twice per day then stick to this schedule and do something else, rather than having the 24-hour news on continuously.
targetString: Uma ngokuvamile ubuka izindaba kabili ngosuku khona-ke gxila kule shejuli bese wenza okunye, kunokuba uhlale uvule izindaba amahora angu-24.

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: I-b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) yi-enzyme ehlezi ngaphandle (kulwelwesi lweseli) kwamaseli emaphashini, imithambo, inhliziyo, izinso, namathumbu.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: I-ACE2 ilwa nokusebenza kwe-angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) ngokunciphisa inani le-angiotensin-II nokukhuphula i-Ang(1-7) iyenze ibe umuthi othembisayo wokwelapha izifo zenhliziyo negazi. I-ACE2 iphinde isebenze njengendawo yokungena kumaseli kuma-coronavirus athile.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: Uhlobo lomuntu lwe-enzyme kuvame ukubhekiselwa kulo ngokuthi yi-hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: I-angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 iyi-metalloenzyme ene-zinc etholakala ebusweni be-endothelial namanye amaseli.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: Iphrotheni le-ACE2 liqukethe idomeyini ye-N-terminal peptidase M2 kanye nedomeyini ye-C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: I-ACE2 iyiphrotheni yolwelwesi ewuhlobo I olunomzila owodwa, enedomeyini yayo esebenza ngama-enzyme echayeke ebusweni bamaseli emaphashini nakwezinye izicubu.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: Idomeyini yangaphandle kweseli ye-ACE2 ihlukaniswa ukusuka kudomeyini ye-transmembrane nge-enzyme eyaziwa ngokuthi yi-sheddase, futhi iphrotheni encibilikayo eba khona ikhishelwa egazini futhi ekugcineni iphumela emchamweni.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: I-ACE2 ikhona ezakhini zomzimba eziningi: i-ACE2 ihlangene nolwelwesi lweseli ikakhulu lwamaseli ohlobo II e-alveolar, ama-enterocytes amathumbu amancane, amaseli e-arterial nawe-venous endothelial namaseli ezicubu abushelelezi e-arterial ezakhini zomzimba eziningi.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: I-ACE2 mRNA itholakala naku-cerebral cortex, ku-striatum, ku-hypothalamus, naku-brainstem.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: Umsebenzi oyinhloko we-ACE2 uwukusebenza njengebhalansi ye-ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: I-ACE ihlukanisa ihomoni ye-angiotensin I ibe yi-vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: I-ACE2 ihlukanisa i-carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine ukusuka ku-angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) bese uyihlukanisa ibe yi-vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 ingaphinde ihlukanise amanye ama-peptides amaningana okubandakanya i-[des-Arg9]-bradykinin, i-apelin, i-neurotensin, i-dynorphin A, ne-ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: I-ACE2 iphinde ilawule ukuhamba kolwelwesi lwe-neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 futhi luhlanganisiwe esifweni sika-Hartnup.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: Njengephrotheni eliyi-transmembrane, i-ACE2 isebenza njengendawo yokungena eyinhloko kumaseli ama-coronavirus athile, okubandakanya i-HCoV-NL63; i-SARS-CoV (igciwane elibangela i-SARS); ne-SARS-CoV-2 (igciwane elibangela i-COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: Ngokuqondile, ukuhlangana kwephrotheni le-spike S1 ye-SARS-CoV ne-SARS-CoV2 kudomeyini eyi-enzyme ye-ACE2 ebusweni bamaseli kuphumela ku-endocytosis nakuhambeni kwakho kokubili igciwane ne-enzyme kuye ku-endosomes ephakathi kwamaseli.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: Le nqubo yokungena iphinde idinge ukwenza i-S protein lenziwe lisebenze yi-serine protease TMPRSS2, isivimbeli esingaphansi kophenyo lwamanje njengesingaba yikhambi lesifo. Lokhu kuye kwaholela abathile ukuba baphethe ngokuthi ukunciphisa amaleveli e-ACE2, kumaseli, kungasiza ekulweni negciwane.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: Nokho, izinhlangano eziningi eziphambili nezindikimba ezisebenzayo zikhuthaze ukuqhubeka ngesivimbeli esivamile se-ACE nokwelapha nge-ARB.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: Ukubuyekeza okuhleliwe nokuhlaziya okushicilelwe ngo-July 11, 2012, kuthole ukuthi "ukusebenzisa izivimbeli ze-ACE kwakuhlobene nokuncipha okukhulu okungu-34% engozini ye-pneumonia uma kuqhathaniswa nezilawuli."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwalokho, "ingozi ye-pneumonia iye yancishiswa ezigulini ezelashwa ngezivimbeli ze-ACE ebezisengozini enkulu ye-pneumonia, ikakhulu lezo ezisifo sikanhlangothi nenhliziyo.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Ukusetshenziswa kwezivimbeli ze-ACE kuye kwaphinde kwahlotshaniswa nokuncipha kweziguli ezibulawa yi-pneumonia, nakuba imiphumela ibingemibi kangako kunomonakalo ongadalwa yi-pneumonia."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Isakhi esiyinhlanganisela somuntu i-ACE2 (rhACE2) kucatshangelwa ukuthi siyindlela yokwelapha entsha yokulimala kwephaphu okubi kakhulu, futhi kubonakala kuthuthukisa i-pulmonary hemodynamics ukuphuma komoya-mpilo ezingulubeni ezine-lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: Uhhafu we-rhACE2 kubantu uthatha amahora angu-10 ukusebenza futhi uqala ukusebenza ngemva kwemizuzu engu-30 ngaphezu kwesikhathi osisebenzayo (inkathi) engamahora angu-24.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Ucwaningo oluthile lubonisa ukuthi i-rhACE2 lungaba umuthi ofanele walabo abangakwazi ukuphuza ama-renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) avamile noma ezifweni lapho i-angiotensin II ejikezelayo isidlondlobele. Ukugcwaliswa kwe-rhACE2 kuye kwahlolwa ocwaningweni lwezokwelapha ekwelapheni i-acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: b'Bat SARS-like coronavirus WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1), also sometimes called SARS-like coronavirus WIV1, is a strain of Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) isolated from Chinese rufous horseshoe bats (Rhinolophus sinicus).
targetString: I-coronavirus WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1) enjenge-b'Bat SARS, ephinde ibizwe ngokuthi yi-coronavirus WIV1 enjenge-SARS, iyi-coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) eyi-acute respiratory syndrome Embi kakhulu evela kumalulwane aseChina abomvana amise okwenyawo lehhashi (amaRhinolophus sinicus).

sourceString: Like all coronaviruses, virions consist of single-stranded positive-sense RNA enclosed within an envelope.
targetString: Njengawo wonke ama-coronavirus, ama-virion ane-RNA ye-single-stranded positive-sense avaleleke emvilophini.

sourceString: The discovery confirms that bats are the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Ucwaningo luqinisekisa ukuthi amalulwane angumthombo ongokwemvelo we-SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis shows the possibility of direct transmission of SARS from bats to humans without the intermediary Chinese civets, as previously believed.
targetString: Ukuhlaziywa kwe-phylogenetic kubonisa ukuthi kunamathuba okudluliseleka ngokuqondile kwe-SARS isuka emalulwaneni iya kubantu ngaphandle kokuhileleka kwama-civet aseChina, njengoba kwakucatshangwa kanjalo ngaphambili.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: Ama-app e-b'COVID-19 ayizinhlelo zesofthiwe yeselula eziklanyelwe ukusiza uthole izinombolo ngokuqondene nomqedazwe wango-2019-20 we-coronavirus, njengenqubo yokuthola abantu ("abathintwayo") okungenzeka baye bathintana nomuntu onegciwane.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: Kuye kwasungulwa noma kwacatshangelwa izinhlelo eziningana, ngokusekela komthetho kahulumeni kwezinye izindawo.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: Kuye kwasungulwa amafremuwekhi okwakha ama-app okuthungatha othintwayo.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: Kuye kwavezwa ukukhathazeka kobumfihlo, ikakhulukazi mayelana namasistimu asekelwe ekulandeleleni indawo abasebenzisi be-app abakuyo.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Ezinye izindlela ezingadingi ulwazi oluyimfihlo zibandakanya ukusetshenziswa kwamasignali eBluetooth ukuze kufakwe indawo umsebenzisi akuyo kwamanye amaselula.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-10 April 2020, i-Google ne-Apple zamemezela ukuthi zizokwakha indlela ukuze zisekele ama-app anjalo eBluetooth ngokuqondile kuma-OS e-Android ne-iOS.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: EChina, uhulumeni waseChina, usebenzelana ne-Alipay, usungule i-app evumela izakhamuzi ukuba zihlole ukuthi ziye zathintana yini nabantu abane-COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: Isetshenziswa emadolobheni angaphezu kuka-200 eChina. ESingapore, kusetshenziswa i-app ebizwa ngokuthi yi-TraceTogether.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: Le app yasungulwa izisebenzi ze-IT zasendaweni, yakhishwa njengewuthombo ovulekile futhi izonikezwa uhulumeni. ENyakatho Macedonia kwakhishwa i-"StopKorona!", i-app esebenza ngeBluetooth ukuze kulandelelwe ukuchayeka kubantu okungenzeka banegciwane futhi kunikezwe ukusabela okusheshayo eziphathimandleni zezempilo.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: Le app yasungulwa uMnyango Wezokuxhumana Nezobuchwepheshe noMnyango Wezempilo.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Kusukela ngomhla ka-14 April 2020, le app yayilindele ukugunyazwa yi-Google Play Store ne-Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: Ngomhla ka-12 April, uhulumeni wathi i-app yokuthungatha umuntu yayisezingeni elithuthukile lokusungulwa, futhi yayizotholakalela ukukhishwa emavikini ambalwa. Kulungiselelwa i-app efanayo e-Ireland, naseFrance ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: Kokubili i-Australia neNew Zealand zicabangela ama-app asekelwe ku-app yaseSingapore i-TraceTogether nephrothokholi ye-BlueTrace. IRussia ihlose ukusungula i-app ebonisayo lapho umuntu eqa imingcele ayibekelwe yeziguli ezitholwe zine-COVID-19 ezihlala eMoscow, eklanyelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abaphumi emakhaya.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: URoss Anderson, uprofesa ongunjiniyela kwezokuvikeleka eCambridge University, ubale izinto eziningana ezingaba yinkinga ngamasistimu e-app, okubandakanya izixwayiso ezidukisayo namathuba okungasitholi isixwayiso uma amandla e-app elinganiselwe enanini elincane kuphela labantu.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: Ukuze ixazulule izinkinga ezimayelana nokubhebhetheka kwama-app "e-coronavirus" adukisayo noma ayingozi, i-Apple ibeke imingcele ezinhlotsheni zezinhlangano ezingafaka ama-app e-coronavirus ku-App Store yayo, yathi kuzoba yilawo "asemthethweni" kuphela noma izinhlangano ezethenjwayo.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: I-Google ne-Amazon zisungule imingcele efanayo.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: Amaqabane alwela ubumfihlo aveze ukukhathazeka kwawo ngokuqondene nezinkinga zokuthungatha uquqaba lwabantu kusetshenziswa ama-app e-coronavirus, ngokukhethekile mayelana nokuthi uhlelo lokuthungatha olusungulelwe ukusingatha umqedazwe we-coronavirus luzoqaqwa lapho lolu songo seludlulile.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: I-Amnesty International nezinye izinhlangano ezingaphezu kuka-100 zikhiphe isitatimende esibeka imingcele kulolu hlobo lokuthungatha.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: Lezi zinhlangano zimise imibandela eyisishiyagalolunye kumaphrojekthi kahulumeni:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: ukuthungatha kufanele kube "semthethweni, okudingekile futhi kufaneleke";

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: ukwelulwa kwenkathi yokuqapha nokuthungatha kufanele kube nemibandela yokushona kwelanga;

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: ukusetshenziswa kwedatha kuzofanele kulinganiselwe ezinjongweni ze-COVID-19;

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: ukuvikeleka kwedatha nokungaziwa kwamagama kuzodingeka kuvikelwe futhi kuboniswe njengokuvikelwe ngokusekelwe ebufakazini;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: ukuhlolwa okuyidijithali kuzofanele kugweme ukwehlisa ububi bobandlululo nokunciphisa ukubaluleka kwezinto;

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: noma ikuphi ukwabelana ngedatha nabanye abantu kuzofanelwe kuchazwe ngokomthetho;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: kuzofanele kube nokuqapha ngokumelene nokusetshenziswa kabi kanye namalungelo ezakhamuzi okusabela ekusetshenzisweni kabi;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: ukuhlanganyela ngendlela ewusizo yibo bonke "abaneqhaza" kuzodingeka, okubandakanya ochwepheshe bezempilo bomphakathi namaqembu amancane. I-German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) ne-Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) nazo zikhiphe izinhlu zokuhlola.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: Uhlelo oluhlongozwayo lwe-Google/Apple luhlose ukulungisa inkinga yokulandelelwa njalo ngokukhipha umsebenzi wokuthungatha kuma-OS edivayisi lapho ungasadingeki.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: Amanye amazwe abesebenzisa ukuthungatha indawo ngokusekelwe kunethiwekhi kunama-app, okuqeda kokubili isidingo sokudawuniloda i-app nokugwema ukulandelelwa.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: E-Israel, ukulandelela okusekelwe kunethiwekhi kwagunyazwa.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: Izixazululo ezisekelwe kunethiwekhi ezinokufinyelela kudatha yendawo engahlungiwe zingaba nezinkinga ezinkulu zobumfihlo.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: Nokho, akuwona wonke amasistimu anamaseva amakhulu okudingeka athole ukufinyelela kudatha yendawo yomuntu; inani lamasistimu avikela ubumfihlo liye lakhiwa asebenzisa amaseva amakhulu ukuze axhumane kuphela (bheka isigaba esingezansi).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: ENingizimu Korea, isistimu engasekelwe ku-app yasetshenziswa ukuze kulandelelwe umuntu.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: Esikhundleni sokusebenzisa i-app eqokiwe, isistimu iqongelela ulwazi lokuthungatha emithonjeni ehlukahlukene okubandakanya idatha yokulandelela idivayisi eyiselula nedatha yokuthenga ngekhadi, futhi ihlanganise lokhu ukuze ithumele izaziso ngemiyalezo yombhalo kubantu okungenzeka banegciwane.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: Ngaphezu kokusebenzisa lolu lwazi ukuze kuxwayiswe abantu okungenzeka bathole igciwane, uhulumeni iphinde yenza ulwazi lwendawo lwatholakalela umphakathi, okuyinto evunyelwe ngenxa yezinguquko eziningi emithethweni yobumfihlo ngemva kokuqubuka kwe-MERS kulelo zwe.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: Lolu lwazi lutholakalela umphakathi ngama-app namawebusayithi. Amazwe abandakanya iGermany acabangele ukusebenzisa kokubili amasistimu amakhulu nalawo avikela ubumfihlo.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: Kusukela ngomhla ka-6 April 2020, imininingwane ayikakhishwa.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Ukulandelela okuvikela ubumfihlo buyindlela eklanywe kahle, enezincwadi zocwaningo eziningi ezisukela emuva okungenani ngo-2013. Kusukela ngomhla ka-7 April 2020, amaqembu ochwepheshe angaphezu kuka-12 abefuna izisombululo ezikwamukelayo ubumfihlo, njengokusebenzisa i-Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) ukuze usondelanise umsebenzisi namanye amaselula.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: Nokho, i-PEPP-PT ingumzamo wokuxhumanisa oqukethe kokubili izindlela ezinkulu nezihlukahlukene, futhi ayiyona iphrothokholi eyodwa. Amaphrothokholi ahlukahlukene abandakanya i-Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), i-Temporary Contact Numbers (i-TCN, i-fka Contact Event Numbers, i-CEN), i-Privacy Sensitive Protocols ne-Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) namanye.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: Kulawa maphrothokholi, idatha yomuntu ebonakalayo ayilokothi ishiye idivayisi, futhi konke ukumatanisa kwenzeka kudivayisi.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: I-Privacy Group e-MIT Media Lab ibilokhu isungula i-SafePaths, ipulatifomu yokusebenzisa amasu okuvikela ubumfihlo lapho iqongelela futhi isebenzisa indawo noma idatha engumzila oyisinqamuleli ukuze kulandelelwe ukubhebhetheka kwe-COVID-19.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: Kusekelwe ocwaningweni oluvela ephepheni elimhlophe i-"Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" elakhishwa ngoMarch 2020. Omunye umzamo ofanayo yipulatifomu ye-SafeTrace ye-Enigma MPC, inkampane esungula ubuchwepheshe bobumfihlo eyasungulwa okokuqala e-MIT Media Lab.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: I-SafeTrace isebenzisa ubuchwepheshe behadiwe obuvikelekile ukuze ivumele abasebenzisi ukuba babelane ngedatha ebucayi yendawo nempilo nabanye abasebenzisi nabezomthetho, ngaphandle kokubeka ubumfihlo baleyo datha engozini.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-5 April 2020, i-TCN Coalition yomhlaba wonke yasungulwa amaqembu abehlanganiswe yilokho obekuyindlela efanayo namaphrothokholi ashiyana kakhulu, ngomgomo wokunciphisa ukuhlukana, futhi kuvunyelwe ukusebenziseka emhlabeni wonke kwama-app okuthungatha nokuxwayisa, isici esibalulekile ekwamukelweni kabanzi.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-9 April 2020, uhulumeni waseSingapore wamemezela ukuthi wenza isimemo sephrothokholi ye-BlueTrace esetshenziswa yi-app wayo kahulumeni esemthethweni.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-10 April 2020, i-Google ne-Apple, izinkampane ezilawula amapulatifomu eselula ye-Android ne-iOS, zamemezela indlela yokuthungatha abantu, futhi zagomela ngokuthi izobuvikela ubumfihlo, ngokusekelwe enhlanganiseleni yobuchwepheshe be-Bluetooth Low Energy ne-cryptography evikela ubumfihlo.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: Ziphinde zashicilela izici zobuchwepheshe obusetshenziswe kusistimu.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: Ngokuvumelana ne-Apple ne-Google, isistimu kuhloswe ukuba ikhishwe ngezigaba ezintathu:

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: ukukhishwa kwamathuluzi ukuze kuvunyelwe ohulumeni ukuba bakhe ama-app asemthethweni athungatha i-coronavirus avikela ubumfihlo

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: ukufakwa kwalesi sici ngokuqondile ohlelweni lwe-iOS ne-AndroidGoogle ne-Apple ukuze kulungiswe izinkinga zokuqalisa nokuqapha okuqhubekayo ngokuthumela kuqala isistimu ngezibuyekezo ze-OS, futhi kamuva ukusikhipha ngendlela efanayo lapho usongo seludlulile.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 drug development is the research process to develop a preventative vaccine or therapeutic prescription drug that would alleviate the severity of 2019-20 coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
targetString: Ukusungulwa komuthi we-b'COVID-19 kuyinqubo yocwaningo yokusungula umuthi owuthola kudokotela wokugoma noma wokwelapha ozonciphisa imiphumela emibi yesifo se-coronavirus sika-2019-20 (COVID-19).

sourceString: The International Clinical Trials Registry Platform of the WHO recorded 536 clinical studies to develop post-infection therapies for COVID-19 infections, with numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections under clinical research to be repurposed.
targetString: I-International Clinical Trials Registry Platform ye-WHO yenze ucwaningo lwezokwelapha olungu-536 ukuze isungule izindlela zokwelapha zangemva kokungenwa yigciwane le-COVID-19, futhi kunemithi eminingana esunguliwe elwa negciwane yokwelapha amanye amagciwane ngaphansi kocwaningo lwezokwelapha ezosetshenziswa ngenye indlela.

sourceString: In March, the WHO initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" in 10 countries, enrolling thousands of people infected with COVID-19 to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: NgoMarch, i-WHO isungule "Ucwaningo OLUYIMBUMBA" emazweni angu-10, yabhalisa izinkulungwane zabantu abanegciwane le-COVID-19 ukuze kuhlolwe imiphumela yokwelapha yemithi emine esikhona elwa negciwane okunamathuba amaningi okuba isebenze.

sourceString: A dynamic, systematic review was established in April 2020 to track the progress of registered clinical trials for COVID-19 vaccine and therapeutic drug candidates.Vaccine and drug development is a multistep process, typically requiring more than five years to assure safety and efficacy of the new compound.
targetString: Ukubuyekeza okunamandla, okuhleliwe kwasungulwa ngo-April 2020 ukuze kulandelelwe inqubo yocwaningo lwezokwelashwa olubhalisiwe lokugomela i-COVID-19 nabantu abathola ukwelashwa ngomuthi. Ukusungulwa komgomo nomuthi kuyinqubo yezinyathelo eziningi, ngokuvamile edinga iminyaka engaphezu kwemihlanu ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuphepha nokusebenza komuthi omusha.

sourceString: Drug development is the process of bringing a new infectious disease vaccine or therapeutic drug to the market once a lead compound has been identified through the process of drug discovery.
targetString: Ukusungulwa komuthi kuyinqubo yokuletha umuthi wokugoma noma wokwelapha isifo esisha emakethe lapho umuthi okuyiwona uye watholwa ngenqubo yokutholwa komuthi.

sourceString: It includes laboratory research on microorganisms and animals, filing for regulatory status, such as via the FDA, for an investigational new drug to initiate clinical trials on humans, and may include the step of obtaining regulatory approval with a new drug application to market the drug.
targetString: Kuhlanganisa ucwaningo lwaselabhorethri ezintweni ezincanyana eziphilayo nasezilwaneni, ukugcinwa kwesimo esilawuliwe, njenge-FDA, lomuthi omusha ophenywayo ukuze kuqaliswe ucwaningo lwezokwelapha kubantu, futhi kungase kubandakanye isinyathelo sokuthola imvume elawulayo ngokubhalisa umuthi omusha ukuze kudayiswe umuthi.

sourceString: Development of a COVID-19 vaccine or therapeutic antiviral drug begins with matching a chemical concept to the potential prophylactic mechanism of the future vaccine or antiviral activity in vivo.
targetString: Ukusungulwa komuthi olwa negciwane wokugoma noma wokwelapha i-COVID-19 kuqala ngokufanelanisa ikhemikhali nemekhenizimu ye-prophylactic yokusebenza komgomo nomuthi olwa negciwane ezintweni eziphilayo.

sourceString: New chemical entities (NCEs, also known as new molecular entities or NMEs) are compounds that emerge from the process of drug discovery to specify a vaccine or antiviral candidate.
targetString: Izinkampane ezintsha zamakhemikhali (ama-NCE, aziwa nangokuthi izinkampane ezintsha zemolekhula noma ama-NME) ziyinhlanganisela ephuma enqubweni yokutholwa komuthi ukuze kucaciswe ikhendidethi yokugoma noma yomuthi olwa negciwane.

sourceString: These have promising activity against a biological target related to COVID-19 disease.
targetString: Lokhu kunomsebenzi othembisayo ngokumelene nethagethi yezinto eziphilayo ehlobene nesifo se-COVID-19.

sourceString: At the beginning of vaccine or drug development, little is known about the safety, toxicity, pharmacokinetics, and metabolism of the NCE in humans.
targetString: Ekuqaleni kokusungulwa komgomo noma umuthi, kuncane okwaziwayo ngokuphepha, ubungozi, ukusebenza komuthi, ukugayeka nokusebenza kwe-NCE kubantu.

sourceString: It is the function and obligation of drug development to assess all of these parameters prior to human clinical trials to prove safety and efficacy.
targetString: Ukusebenza nokuzibophezela ekusungulweni komuthi ukuba kuhlolwe wonke la mapharimitha ngaphambi kokuba ucwaningo lwezokwelapha lwabantu lubonakale luphephile futhi lusebenza.

sourceString: A further major objective of drug development is to recommend the dose and schedule for the first use in a human clinical trial ("first-in-human" [FIH] or First Human Dose [FHD], previously also known as "first-in-man" [FIM]).
targetString: Omunye umgomo omkhulu wokusungulwa komuthi uwukusikisela umthamo neshejuli yokusetshenziswa okokuqala ocwaningweni lwezokwelapha lwabantu (i-"first-in-human" [FIH] noma i-First Human Dose [FHD], eyayaziwa ngaphambilini ngokuthi yi-"first-in-man" [FIM]).

sourceString: In addition, drug development must establish the physicochemical properties of the NCE: its chemical makeup, stability, and solubility.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukusungulwa komuthi kumelwe kubeke isisekelo sezici eziyi-physicochemical ze-NCE: ukwakheka kwamakhemikhali ayo, ukuzinza, nokuncibilika.

sourceString: Manufacturers must optimize the process they use to make the chemical so they can scale up from a medicinal chemist producing milligrams, to manufacturing on the kilogram and ton scale.
targetString: Abasunguli kumelwe bathuthukise inqubo abayisebenzisela ukwenza ikhemikhali ukuze bathuthuke ekubeni ikhemisi lemithi elikhiqiza amamiligremu, kuye ekukhiqizeni amakhilogremu ukuya kumathani.

sourceString: They further examine the product for suitability to package as capsules, tablets, aerosol, intramuscular injectable, subcutaneous injectable, or intravenous formulations.
targetString: Baphinde bahlole ukufaneleka komkhiqizo ukuba ufakwe kumaphakheji njengamakhepsuli, amathebhulethi, ama-aerosol, umjovo wezicubu, umjovo wangaphansi kwesikhumba, noma imijovo yemithambo.

sourceString: Together, these processes are known in preclinical and clinical development as chemistry, manufacturing, and control (CMC).Many aspects of drug development focus on satisfying the regulatory requirements of drug licensing authorities.
targetString: Zindawonye, lezi zinqubo zaziwa ekusunguleni kwangaphambi naphakathi kokwelapha njenge-chemistry, i-manufacturing, ne-control (CMC). Izici eziningi zokusungulwa komuthi zigxila ekwaneliseni izimfuneko ezilawulayo zeziphathimandla zamalayisensi omuthi.

sourceString: These generally constitute tests designed to determine the major toxicities of a novel compound prior to first use in humans.
targetString: Lezi ngokuvamile zakha ukuhlola okuklanyelwe ukubona ubungozi obukhulu nomuthi omusha ngaphambi kokuba usetshenziswe okokuqala kubantu.

sourceString: The Canadian government announced CA$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian universities, with plans to establish a "vaccine bank" of new vaccines for implementation if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Uhulumeni waseCanada umemezele izigidi ezingu-CA$275 zemali yamaphrojekthi ocwaningo angu-96 ekuvimbeleni ubungozi kwezokwelapha ngokumelene ne-COVID-19, okubandakanya iziguli ezigomayo eziningi emayunivesithi aseCanada, nezinhlelo zokusungula "ibhange lokugoma" lemigomo emisha ezosetshenziswa uma kuqubuka enye i-coronavirus.

sourceString: Clinical trial programs involve three, multiple-year stages toward product approval, and a fourth, post-approval stage for ongoing safety monitoring of the vaccine or drug therapy:
targetString: Izinhlelo zocwaningo lwezokwelapha zibandakanya izigaba ezintathu, zeminyaka eminingi eholela ekugunyazweni komkhiqizo, kanye nesigaba sesine, sangemva kokugunyazwa sokuqashwa kokuphepha okuqhubekayo komuthi wokugoma noma owokwelapha:

sourceString: Phase I trials, usually in healthy volunteers, determine safety and dosing.
targetString: Ucwaningo lwesigaba I, ngokuvamile kumavolontiya ayimiqemane, lubonisa ukuphepha nomthamo.

sourceString: Phase II trials are used to establish an initial reading of efficacy and further explore safety in small numbers of people having the disease targeted by the NCE.
targetString: Ucwaningo lwesigaba II lusetshenziselwa ukusungula umphumela wokuqala wokusebenza futhi uphinde uhlole ukuphepha emananini amancane abantu abanesifo esicwaningwa yi-NCE.

sourceString: Phase III trials are large, pivotal trials to determine safety and efficacy in sufficiently large numbers of people with the COVID-19 infection.
targetString: Ucwaningo lwesigaba III ucwaningo olukhulu, olubucayi lokuhlola ukuphepha nokusebenza emananini amakhulu abantu abanesifo se-COVID-19.

sourceString: If safety and efficacy are adequately proved, clinical testing may stop at this step and the NCE advances to the new drug application (NDA) stage to begin marketing.
targetString: Uma ukuphepha nokusebenza kubonakala ngokwanele, ukuhlola kwezokwelashwa kungase kumiswe kulesi sinyathelo futhi i-NCE iqhubekela esigabeni se-new drug application (NDA) ukuze iqale ukudayisa.

sourceString: Phase IV trials are post-approval trials that may be a condition attached by the FDA, also called post-market surveillance studies.
targetString: Ucwaningo lwesigaba IV ucwaningo lwangemva kokugunyaza okungenzeka luyisimo esifakwe yi-FDA, oluphinde lubizwe ngokuthi ucwaningo lokucubungula lwangemva kokudayisa.

sourceString: In addition to the tests required to move a novel vaccine or antiviral drug into the clinic for the first time, manufacturers must ensure that any long-term or chronic toxicities are well-defined, including effects on systems not previously monitored (fertility, reproduction, immune system, among others).
targetString: Ngaphezu kokuhlola okudingekayo ukuze kufakwe umgomo noma umuthi olwa negciwane omusha emtholampilo okokuqala ngqa, abaklami kumelwe baqikelele ukuthi noma ibuphi ubungozi besikhathi eside noma obungamahlalakhona buyalungiswa, okubandakanya imiphumela yamasistimu abengahloliwe ngaphambilini (ukukhulelwa, ukukhiqiza kabusha, amasosha omzimba, phakathi kokunye).

sourceString: In the United States, this process is called a "new drug application" or NDA.
targetString: E-United States, le nqubo ibizwa ngokuthi yi-"new drug application" noma i-NDA.

sourceString: A clinical trial design in progress may be modified as an "adaptive design" if accumulating data in the trial provide early insights about positive or negative efficacy of the treatment.
targetString: Ucwaningo lwezokwelapha olusaklanywa lungase luchazwe ngokuthi "umklamo ovumelana nezimo" uma ukuqongelela idatha ocwaningweni kunikeza ulwazi olusha ngokusebenza okuhle noma okungekuhle komuthi.

sourceString: The global Solidarity and European Discovery trials of hospitalized people with severe COVID-19 infection apply adaptive design to rapidly alter trial parameters as results from the four experimental therapeutic strategies emerge.
targetString: Ucwaningo lomhlaba wonke lwe-Solidarity and European Discovery lwabantu abasezibhedlela abanegciwane elibi le-COVID-19 lusebenzisa umklamo osebenzisekayo ukuze usheshe ushintshe izici zocwaningo njengomphumela wokuba khona kwezindlela zokwelapha ezine ezicwaningwayo.

sourceString: Adaptive designs within ongoing Phase II-III clinical trials on candidate therapeutics may shorten trial durations and use fewer subjects, possibly expediting decisions for early termination or success, and coordinating design changes for a specific trial across its international locations.
targetString: Imiklamo evumelana nezimo phakathi nocwaningo lwezokwelapha Lwesigaba II-III kubantu abelashwayo inganciphisa isikhathi socwaningo futhi isebenzise abantu abambalwa, mhlawumbe kunqunywe ukumiswa ngaphambi kwesikhathi noma ukuphumelela, nokuxhumanisa ushintsho lomklamo locwaningo oluthile kuzo zonke izindawo emhlabeni jikelele.

sourceString: Most novel drug candidates (NCEs) fail during drug development, either because they have unacceptable toxicity or because they simply do not prove efficacy on the targeted disease, as shown in Phase II-III clinical trials.
targetString: Amakhendidethi amaningi omuthi omusha (ama-NCE) ayehluleka phakathi nokusungulwa komuthi, kungaba ngenxa yokuthi anobungozi obungamukeleki noma ngenxa yokuthi nje awabonakali efaneleka esifweni eselashwayo, njengoba kuboniswe Esigabeni II-III socwaningo lwezokwelapha.

sourceString: The high failure rates associated with pharmaceutical development are referred to as an "attrition rate", requiring decisions during the early stages of drug development to "kill" projects early to avoid costly failures.
targetString: Amanani okwehluleka okukhulu ahlobene nokusungulwa kwemithi abizwa ngokuthi "isilinganiso sobuthaka", okudinga izinqumo phakathi nezigaba zokuqala zokusungulwa komuthi ukuze "kubulawe" amaphrojekthi kusenesikhathi ukuze kugwenywe ukwehluleka okuyizindleko.

sourceString: One 2010 study assessed both capitalized and out-of-pocket costs for bringing a single new drug to market as about US$1.8 billion and $870 million, respectively.
targetString: Olunye ucwaningo lwango-2010 lwahlola kokubili izindleko eziqongelelwe nezikhokhelwe zokufaka umuthi omusha owodwa emakethe okwaba amabhiliyoni angu-US$1.8 nezigidi ezingu-$870, ngokulandelana.

sourceString: A median cost estimate of 2015-16 trials for development of 10 anti-cancer drugs was $648 million.
targetString: Isillinganiso semidiya esindleko zocwaningo luka-2015-16 ekusungulweni kwemithi elwa nomdlavuza engu-10 saba izigidi ezingu-$648.

sourceString: In a 2016 review of 106 drug candidates assessed through clinical trials, the total capital expenditure for a manufacturer having a drug approved through successful Phase III trials was $2.6 billion (in 2013 dollars), an amount increasing at an annual rate of 8.5%.
targetString: Ekubuyekezeni kwango-2016 kwamakhendidethi omuthi angu-106 ahlolwa ocwaningweni lwezokwelapha, ingqikithi yezindleko eziyinhloko zomklami onomuthi ogunyazwe ngocwaningo oluphumelele Lwesigaba III yaba amabhiliyoni angu-$2.6 (ngamadola ango-2013), inani elinyuka ngesilinganiso saminyaka yonke esingu-8.5%.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating repurposed drugs already approved to treat malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine phosphate.
targetString: Ucwaningo oluyisikhombisa beluhlola imithi esetshenziswa kabusha esigunyaziwe kakade ekwelapheni umalaleveva, okubandakanya ucwaningo olune lwe-hydroxychloroquine noma i-chloroquine phosphate.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with 9 Phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: Imithi elwa negciwane esetshenziswa kabusha iyingxenye enkulu yocwaningo lwaseChina, futhi ucwaningo olungu-9 Lwesigaba III lwe-remdesivir emazweni amaningana luzokhipha umbiko ngasekupheleni kuka-April.

sourceString: Led by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation with partners investing US$125 million and coordinating with the World Health Organization, the COVID-19 Therapeutics Accelerator began in March, facilitating drug development researchers to rapidly identify, assess, develop, and scale up potential treatments.
targetString: Iholwa yi-Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation nabalingane abatshale imali eyizigidi ezingu-US$125 futhi abaxhumene ne-World Health Organization, i-COVID-19 Therapeutics Accelerator yaqala ngo-March, yahlela abacwaningi abaklama umuthi ukuba basheshe bathole, bahlole, basungule, futhi bahlaziye imithi engasetshenziswa.

sourceString: The COVID-19 Clinical Research Coalition formed to coordinate and expedite results from international clinical trials on the most promising post-infection treatments.
targetString: I-COVID-19 Clinical Research Coalition yakhiwa ukuze ixhumanise futhi kusheshiswe imiphumela esuka ocwaningweni lwezokwelapha lwakwamanye amazwe ekwelashweni kwangemva kokungenwa igciwane okwethenjwayo.

sourceString: In early 2020, numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections were being repurposed or developed in new clinical research efforts to alleviate the illness of COVID-19.
targetString: Ngasekuqaleni kuka-2020, imithi elwa negciwane eminingana esunguliwe yokwelapha amanye amagciwane abesetshenziswa kabusha noma esungulwa emizamweni emisha yocwaningo lwezokwelapha ukuze kuncishiswe isifo se-COVID-19.

sourceString: For an already-approved drug (such as hydroxychloroquine for malaria), Phase III-IV trials determine in hundreds to thousands of COVID-19-infected people the possible extended use of an already-approved drug for treating COVID-19 infection.
targetString: Kumuthi osugunyaziwe kakade (njenge-hydroxychloroquine yomalaleveva), ucwaningo Lwesigaba III-IV lubona kubantu abangamakhulu ukuya ezinkulungwaneni abanegciwane le-COVID-19 ukusetshenziswa okweluliwe komuthi osugunyaziwe kakade ekwelapheni igciwane le-COVID-19.

sourceString: As of early April 2020, 103 candidate therapeutics were in preclinical or a stage of Phase I-IV development, with trial results for 29 drug candidates expected during April.
targetString: Kusukela ekuqaleni kuka-April 2020, amakhendidethi angu-103 asiza ekwelapheni abesekusungulweni kwangaphambi kokwelashwa noma esitejini Sesigaba I-IV, futhi imiphumela yocwaningo yamakhendidethi angu-29 omuthi ibilindelwe phakathi no-April.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization (WHO) launched the coordinated "Solidarity trial" in 10 countries to rapidly assess in thousands of COVID-19 infected people the potential efficacy of existing antiviral and anti-inflammatory agents not yet evaluated specifically for COVID-19 illness.
targetString: Ngo-March, i-World Health Organization (WHO) yasungula "Ucwaningo oluyimbumba" oluhlanganyelwayo emazweni angu-10 ukuze kusheshe kuhlolwe kubantu abayizinkulungwane abanegciwane le-COVID-19 ukusebenza kwama-ejenti alwa negciwane atholakalayo nadambisayo abengakahlolelwa ngokukhethekile ukugula kwe-COVID-19.

sourceString: Do any of the drugs reduce mortality?
targetString: Ingabe ikhona imithi enciphisa abantu abafayo?

sourceString: Do any of the drugs reduce the time a patient is hospitalized?
targetString: Ingabe ikhona imithi enciphisa isikhathi isiguli esilaliswa ngaso esibhedlela?

sourceString: Do the treatments affect the need for people with COVID-19-induced pneumonia to be ventilated or maintained in intensive care?
targetString: Ingabe ukwelashwa kuyasithinta isidingo sokuba abantu abanenyumoniya edalwe yi-COVID-19 bahlolwe noma bagcinwe benakekelwa ngokucophelela?

sourceString: Could such drugs be used to minimize the illness of COVID-19 infection in healthcare staff and people at high risk of developing severe illness?Enrolling people with COVID-19 infection is simplified by using data entries, including informed consent, on a WHO website.
targetString: Ingabe imithi enjalo ingasetshenziselwa ukunciphisa ukugula kwegciwane le-COVID-19 ezisebenzini zezempilo nakubantu abasengozini enkulu yokuba nesifo esibi? Ukubhalisa abantu abanegciwane le-COVID-19 kwenziwa lula ngokusebenzisa idatha egciniwe, okubandakanya imvume enolwazi, kuwebusayithi ye-WHO.

sourceString: After the trial staff determines the drugs available at the hospital, the WHO website randomizes the hospitalized subject to one of the trial drugs or to the hospital standard of care for treating COVID-19.
targetString: Ngemva kokuba izisebenzi zocwaningo sezithole imithi etholakalayo esibhedlela, iwebusayithi ye-WHO iqokela ngokungahleliwe umuntu osesibhedlela umuthi owodwa wocwaningo noma indlela evamile yokwelapha i-COVID-19.

sourceString: The trial physician records and submits follow-up information about the subject status and treatment, completing data input via the WHO Solidarity website.
targetString: Udokotela wocwaningo urekhoda futhi athumele ulwazi lokulandelela ngesimo sesiguli nokwelashwa kwaso, agcwalise idatha ngewebusayithi ye-WHO Solidarity.

sourceString: A global safety monitoring board of WHO physicians examine interim results to assist decisions on safety and effectiveness of the trial drugs, and alter the trial design or recommend an effective therapy.
targetString: Ibhodi yokuqapha ukuphepha emhlabeni wonke yodokotela be-WHO ihlola imiphumela ukuze isize ezinqumweni zokuphepha nokusebenza kwemithi yocwaningo, futhi ishintshe umklamo wocwaningo noma isikisele ukwelashwa okusebenzayo.

sourceString: A similar web-based study to Solidarity, called "Discovery", was initiated in March across seven countries by INSERM (Paris, France).During March, funding for the Solidarity trial reached US$108 million from 203,000 individuals, organizations and governments, with 45 countries involved in financing or trial management.
targetString: Ucwaningo olufanayo olusekelwe kuwebhu Oluhlanganyelwayo, olubizwa ngokuthi yi-"Discovery", lwasungulwa ngo-March emazweni ayisikhombisa yi-INSERM (eParis, eFrance). Phakathi no-March, izimali zocwaningo locwaningo Oluhlanganyelwayo zafinyelela ezigidini ezingu-US$108 ezivela kubantu, izinhlangano nohulumeni abangu-203,000, futhi amazwe angu-45 ahileleka ekuxhaseni noma ekulawuleni ucwaningo.

sourceString: Numerous candidate drugs under study as "supportive" treatments to relieve discomfort during illness, such as NSAIDs or bronchodilators, are not included in the table below.
targetString: Imithi yamakhendidethi eminingana ngaphansi kocwaningo njengokwelashwa "kokusekela" ukuze kuncishiswe izinhlungu phakathi nokugula, njengama-NSAID noma izifutho, azihlanganisiwe kuthebula elingezansi.

sourceString: Others in early-stage Phase II trials or numerous treatment candidates in Phase I trials, are also excluded.
targetString: Abanye abasocwaningweni lweziteji zokuqala Zesigaba II noma amakhendidethi amaningi elashwayo ocwaningweni Lwesigaba I, nabo abahlanganisiwe.

sourceString: Drug candidates in Phase I-II trials have a low rate of success (under 12%) to pass through all trial phases to gain eventual approval.
targetString: Amakhendidethi omuthi ocwaningweni Lwesigaba I-II anezinga eliphansi lempumelelo (ngaphansi kula-12%) ukuze adlule kuzo zonke izigaba zocwaningo futhi athole ukugunyazwa.

sourceString: Hydroxychloroquine is more commonly available than chloroquine in the United States.
targetString: I-hydroxychloroquine itholakala kakhudlwana kune-chloroquine e-United States.

sourceString: Although several countries use chloroquine or hydroxychloroquine for treatment of persons hospitalized with COVID-19, as of March 2020 the drug has not been formally approved through clinical trials in the United States.
targetString: Nakuba amazwe amaningana esebenzisa i-chloroquine noma i-hydroxychloroquine ekwelapheni abantu abasezibhedlela abane-COVID-19, kusukela ngo-March 2020 umuthi ubungakagunyazwa ngokomthetho ngocwaningo lwezokwelashwa e-United States.

sourceString: Chloroquine has been recommended by Chinese, South Korean and Italian health authorities for the treatment of COVID-19, although these agencies and the US CDC noted contraindications for people with heart disease or diabetes.
targetString: I-chloroquine iye yanconywa iziphathimandla zezempilo zaseChina, eNingizimu Korea nase-Italy ekwelapheni i-COVID-19, nakuba la ma-ejensi ne-US CDC yaphawula izinkinga kubantu abanesifo senhliziyo noma isifo sikashukela.

sourceString: Both drugs have extensive interactions with prescription drugs, affecting the therapeutic dose and disease mitigation.
targetString: Yomibili imithi isebenza ngendlela ephawulekayo nemithi enikezwa ngodokotela, ithinte umthamo wokwelashwa nokudamba kwesifo.

sourceString: Some people have allergic reactions to these drugs.On 12 April, a preliminary clinical trial conducted at a hospital in Brazil was stopped when several people given high doses of chloroquine for COVID-19 infection developed irregular heart rates, causing 11 deaths.
targetString: Abantu abathile bavukwa yi-aleji uma bephuza le mithi. Ngo-12 April, ucwaningo lwezokwelashwa lokulungiselela olwaluqhutshwa esibhedlela saseBrazil lwamiswa lapho abantu abaningana abanikezwa imithamo ephakeme ye-chloroquine ekwelapheni igciwane le-COVID-19 baba nezinkinga zenhliziyo ezingavamile, ezabangela ukufa kwabangu-11.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show that favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Ucwaningo lwezokwelapha eChina eWuhan naseShenzhen kuthiwa lwabonisa ukuthi i-favipiravir "iyasebenza ngempela".

sourceString: Of 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: Ezigulini ezingu-35 eShenzhen ezazinegathivu lapho zihlolwa phakathi nezinsuku ezingu-4, kuyilapho ubude bokugula babuyizinsuku ezingu-11 ezigulini ezingu-45 ezingazange ziyithole.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: Ocwaningweni olwaqhutshwa eWuhan ezigulini ezingu-240 ezinenyumoniya ezinguhhafu zanikezwa i-favipiravir kanti omunye uhhafu wanikezwa i-umifenovir.

sourceString: The term "preclinical research" is defined by laboratory studies in vitro and in vivo, indicating a beginning stage for development of a vaccine, antiviral or monoclonal antibody therapy, such as experiments to determine effective doses and toxicity, before a candidate compound is advanced for safety and efficacy evaluation in humans.
targetString: Igama elithi "ucwaningo lwangaphambi kwezimpawu zesifo" luchazwa ucwaningo lwaselabhorethri ku-vitro naku-vivo, okubonisa isigaba sokuqala sokusungulwa komgomo, ukwelashwa kokulwa negciwane noma izakhi zesifo ezakhiwa iseli eyodwa, njengocwaningo lokuhlola ukusebenza kwemithamo efanele nobungozi, ngaphambi kokuba umuthi ohlolwayo uthuthukele ekuhlolweni kokuphepha nokusebenza kubantu.

sourceString: Some antibiotics may be repurposed as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: Eminye imithi elwa negciwane ingase isetshenziswe kabusha ekwelapheni i-COVID-19:

sourceString: In March 2020, the main protease of the SARS-CoV-2 virus was identified as a target for post-infection drugs.
targetString: Ngo-March 2020, i-protease eyinhloko yegciwane le-SARS-CoV-2 yatholwa njengethagethi lemithi yangemva kokungenwa igciwane.

sourceString: This enzyme is essential to the host cell to reproduce the ribonucleic acid of the virus.
targetString: Le enzyme ibalulekile kuseli elinegciwane ukuze ikhiqize kabusha i-ribonucleic acid yegciwane.

sourceString: To find the enzyme, scientists used the genome published by Chinese researchers in January 2020 to isolate the main protease.
targetString: Ukuze kutholakale i-enzyme, ososayensi basebenzise izakhi zeseli ezishicilelwe abacwaningi baseChina ngo-January 2020 ukuze kukhishwe i-protease eyinhloko.

sourceString: As a potential combination therapy, they are used together in two Phase III arms of the 2020 global Solidarity project on COVID-19.
targetString: Njengokwelapha okuyinhlanganisela okungaba usizo, asetshenziswa ndawonye ezingxenyeni ezimbili Zesigaba III zephrojekthi Ehlanganyelwayo yomhlaba wonke ka-2020 ye-COVID-19.

sourceString: A preliminary study in China of combined lopinavir and ritonavir found no effect in people hospitalized for COVID-19.
targetString: Ucwaningo lwangaphambi kwesikhathi eChina lwenhlanganisela ye-lopinavir ne-ritonavir alutholanga mphumela kubantu abalaliswe esibhedlela ngenxa ye-COVID-19.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: I-b'Drug repositioning (ephinde yaziwe ngokuthi ukusetshenziswa kabusha komuthi, i-re-profiling, i-re-tasking noma i-therapeutic switching) iwukusebenzisa kabusha umuthi ogunyaziwe ukuze kwelashwe esinye isifo noma isimo sezempilo esihlukile kuleso eyayakhelwe sona.

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: Lolu uhlobo locwaningo lwezesayensi olwenziwayo njengamanje ukuze kusungulwe izindlela zokwelapha i-COVID-19 eziphephile neziphumelelayo.

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: Ezinye iziqondiso zocwaningo zibandakanya ukusungulwa komgomo we-COVID-19 nokumpontshelwa i-convalescent plasma. I-SARS-CoV-2 inamaphrotheni angaba ngu-66 akwazi ukusebenzisa umuthi, ngayinye inamasayithi amaningi okuhlangana kuwo amamolekhuli.

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: Ukuhlaziya lawo masayithi okuhlanganwa kuwo kwakha iphrojekthi enengqondo yokusungula umuthi olwa negciwane ngokumelene namaphrotheni e-COVID-19.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: Kumaphrotheni abhekiwe abaluleke kakhulu e-SARS-CoV-2 yi-protease enjenge-papain, i-RNA polymerase esekelwe ku-RNA, i-helicase, i-S protein, ne-ADP ribophosphatase.

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: U-Hussein A A, nabanye bacwaninga imithi eminingana engasetshenziswa kwabe sekuthuthukiswa futhi kuhlaziywa ukufana kwesakhiwo sayo ngemithi egunyaziwe efanayo ephakeme ukuze kusheshiswe ukusungulwa komuthi onamandla wokwelapha i-SARS-CoV-2 kulolu cwaningo lwangaphambi kokwelapha ongase usetshenziswe njengomuthi wocwaningo.

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: I-chloroquine ingumuthi wokwelapha umalaleveva ophinde usetshenziselwe izifo ezithile zamasosha omzimba.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-18 March, i-WHO yamemezela ukuthi i-chloroquine ne-hydroxychloroquine ehlobene nayo zizoba phakathi kwemithi emine ecwaningwa njengengxenye yocwaningo lwezokwelapha Oluhlanganisiwe.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: Umphathi-sifundazwe waseNew York u-Andrew Cuomo wamemezela ukuthi ucwaningo lweSifunda saseNew York lwe-chloroquine ne-hydroxychloroquine luzoqala ngomhla ka-24 March. Ngomhla ka-28 March, i-FDA yagunyaza ukusetshenziswa kwe-hydroxychloroquine sulfate ne-chloroquine phosphate ngaphansi kwe-Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: Lokhu kwelashwa akukagunyazwa yinqubo yocwaningo yezokwelapha ye-FDA futhi igunyazwa ngaphansi kwe-EUA kuphela njengendlela yokwelapha ecwaningwayo ezosetshenziselwa izimo eziphuthumayo ezigulini ezilaliswa esibhedlela kodwa ezingakwazi ukwamukela ukwelashwa ocwaningweni lwezokwelapha.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: I-CDC ithe "ukusetshenziswa, umthamo, noma inkathi ye-hydroxychloroquine ku-prophylaxis noma ukwelashwa kwegciwane le-SARS-CoV-2" akukalungi.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: Odokotela bathe basebenzisa umuthi lapho "ingekho enye indlela".

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: Ithimba locwaningo laseTurkey e-Istanbul liqhuba ucwaningo oluncane ekusebenziseni i-chloroquine ihlanganiswe ne-zinc, i-vitamin A, i-vitamin C ne-vitamin D.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: Ucwaningo olukhulu luyaqhubeka eDuke University nase-University of Oxford.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: I-NYU Langone Medical School iqhuba ucwaningo lokuphepha nokusebenza kwe-hydroxychloroquine ukuze kuvinjelwe isifo.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Ucwaningo lwezokwelapha lwaseChina eWuhan naseShenzhen luthi kubonakala i-favipiravir "isebenza ngempela".

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: Iziguli ezingu-35 eShenzhen zitholwe zinegathivu ekuhlolweni phakathi nezinsuku ezingu-4, kuyilapho ubude bokugula babuyizinsuku ezingu-11 ezigulini ezingu-45 ezingazange ziyithole.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: Ocwaningweni oluqhutshwa eWuhan ezigulini ezingu-240 ezinenyumoniya, uhhafu wanikezwa i-favipiravir omunye uhhafu wanikwa i-umifenovir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: I-Italian Pharmaceutical Agency yakhumbuza umphakathi ukuthi ubufakazi obukhona ekusekeleni umuthi bumbalwa futhi obangaphambi kokuba usebenze.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-2 April, i-Germany yamemezela ukuthi izowuthenga umuthi eJapan iwubeke esitokweni, bese isebenzisa amasosha ukuze athumele umuthi ezibhedlela zaseyunivesithi, lapho umuthi uzosetshenziswa khona ekwelapheni iziguli ezine-COVID-19.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: Ngokuvumelana ne-South China Morning Post, uShinzo Abe uye wazethula emkhandlwini ka-Trump mayelana nokuthenga umuthi. Umuthi ungase ungasebenzi ngokuphelele ezimweni ezimbi kakhulu zokugula lapho igciwane seliye laphindaphindeka khona.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: Kungaba okungaphephile ukuwusebenzisa kwabesifazane abakhulelwe noma lapho abazama ukukhulelwa.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: Olunye ucwaningo lwe-lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), inhlanganisela yemithi elwa negciwane i-lopinavir ne-ritonavir, lwaphetha ngokuthi "ayikho inzuzo etholakele".

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: Le mithi yayiklanyelwe ukuvimbela i-HIV ekuphindaphindekeni ngokuhlangana ne-protease.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: Ithimba labacwaningi e-University of Colorado lizama ukushintsha imithi ukuze lithole uketshezi oluzohlangana ne-protease ye-SARS-CoV-2. Kunabagxeki emphakathini wososayensi ngokuqondisa imizamo ekusebenziseni kabusha imithi eklanyelwe ngokukhethekile i-HIV/AIDS.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: I-WHO ibandakanye i-lopinavir/ritonavir ocwaningweni Oluhlanganisiwe lomhlaba jikelele.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: I-Remdesivir yakhiwa futhi yasungulwa yi-Gilead Sciences njengomuthi wokwelapha igciwane le-Ebola nezifo ze-Marburg. I-Gilead Sciences yathola ukuthi i-Remdesivir ibinomsebenzi wokulwa negciwane ku-vitro ngokumelene namagciwane e-filo-, e-pneumo-, e-paramyxo-, ne-corona- .

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: Inkinga eyodwa ngokwelashwa okulwa negciwane ukusungula indlela yokwelapha ngama-mutation angaholela esifweni esibi kakhulu nesithelelanayo.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
